original: mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas /
translated: Abiding in space-like evenness.

original: zhes pa gong gi longs sku tshom bu dang bcas pa dang / phyis grol ba'i sangs rgyas gnyis ka rin po che'i sbubs nas dgongs pa dbyer med par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa gong gi longs sku tshom bu dang bcas pa dang / phyis grol ba'i sangs rgyas gnyis ka rin po che'i sbubs nas dgongs pa dbyer med par gnas pa'o //
translated: Both the sambhogakaya and the retinue above and the buddhas who are freed later abide inseparably in the transcendent state of the precious enclosure.

original: de yang rang gsal rtog med de /
analyzed: de yang rang gsal rtog med de /
translated: Moreover, it is self-luminous and nonconceptual.

original: so sor ma 'dres ba la mi 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: so sor ma 'dres ba la mi 'byed pa'o //
translated: It is not divided into individual, distinct aspects.

original: dus der nyon mongs pa'i dri ma kun las 'das te /
analyzed: dus der nyon mongs pa'i dri ma kun las 'das te /
translated: At that time, one transcends all the stains of afflictions.

original: dus gsum sku gsum dang du grol //
analyzed: dus gsum sku gsum dang du grol //
translated: The three times are liberated into the three kayas.

original: dug lnga ye shes kyi bum pa lngar grol /
analyzed: dug lnga ye shes kyi bum pa lngar grol /
translated: The five poisons are liberated into the vase of the five pristine consciousnesses.

original: ma rig pa rig pa zang thal chen por grol bas mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa rig pa zang thal chen por grol bas mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: Since ignorance is liberated into the great, unobstructed state of awareness, one attains nirvana.

original: dus gsum dus med rtogs pa po //
analyzed: dus gsum dus med rtogs pa po //
translated: The one who realizes the three times to be timeless🔽.

original: zhes pa ma rtogs pa la dus gsum du @51b snang yang rtog pa la mi gnas te /
analyzed: zhes pa ma rtogs pa la dus gsum du @51b snang yang rtog pa la mi gnas te /
translated: Although the three times appear to those who have not realized this, they do not abide in the mind.

original: rig pa skye 'gag med pa gcig tu gnas so //
analyzed: rig pa skye 'gag med pa gcig tu gnas so //
translated: Awareness abides as a single state without arising or ceasing.🔽The great chief of all sentient beings

original: sems can kun gyi gtso bo che //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi gtso bo che //
translated: .🔽The crown of those with the crown of good qualities

original: yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod //
analyzed: yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod //
translated: The head of those with the best qualities.🔽

original: ces pa sprul pa'i sku 'gro drug gi gtso bo'am thod lta bur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa sprul pa'i sku 'gro drug gi gtso bo'am thod lta bur gyur pa'o //
translated: The nirmanakaya is the chief or crown of the six kinds of migrating beings.🔽Liberated from all bodies

original: lus kun las ni rnam par grol //
analyzed: lus kun las ni rnam par grol //
translated: And is completely free from the body.🔽

original: zhes pa sems can gyi lus gdos pa can las skad cig ma la grol ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa sems can gyi lus gdos pa can las skad cig ma la grol ba'o //
translated: In an instant, one is liberated from the body of a sentient being with a physical body.🔽Dwelling on the path of space

original: nam mkha'i lam la rab gnas pa //
analyzed: nam mkha'i lam la rab gnas pa //
translated: Abiding in the path of space,🔽

original: zhes pa chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu las ma g-yos pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu las ma g-yos pa'o //
translated: One does not move from the space-like dharmata.

original: yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang //
translated: The great wish-fulfilling gem is worn.

original: zhes pa rig pa chos kyi sku yon tan gyi sku gnyis dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir //
analyzed: zhes pa rig pa chos kyi sku yon tan gyi sku gnyis dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir //
translated: Since awareness is inseparable from the two kāyas of the dharmakāya and the kāya of qualities,

original: sku gnyis nang gsal du 'chang ba'o //🔽khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi mchog / ces pa chos sku dngos med las ye shes 'gag med 'char zhing ye shes 'gag med kyi don gyis thams cad la ma khyab pa med de med pa de ni /
analyzed: sku gnyis nang gsal du 'chang ba'o // khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi mchog / ces pa chos sku dngos med las ye shes 'gag med 'char zhing ye shes 'gag med kyi don gyis thams cad la ma khyab pa med de med pa de ni /
translated: the two kāyas are worn as inner luminosity.🔽The all-pervading lord is the supreme gem of all.🔽Since pristine consciousness arises without impediment from the nonentity of the dharmakāya, the meaning of pristine consciousness without impediment pervades everything.

original: rin po che'i nang nas kyang mchog tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rin po che'i nang nas kyang mchog tu gyur pa'o //
translated: That nonexistence is the supreme gem among all gems.

original: dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste//
analyzed: dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste//
translated: The great wish-fulfilling tree is vast.

original: zhes pa rig pa chos sku rin po che dang 'dra ba las yon tan phyogs med du 'byung ba dang / rin po che'i shing la rtsa ba yod pa dang 'dra bar rig pa nyid do //
analyzed: zhes pa rig pa chos sku rin po che dang 'dra ba las yon tan phyogs med du 'byung ba dang / rin po che'i shing la rtsa ba yod pa dang 'dra bar rig pa nyid do //
translated: Since qualities arise without partiality from awareness, which is like a precious gem, and since awareness itself is like the root of a precious tree,

original: yal ga yod pa dang 'dra bar spros pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: yal ga yod pa dang 'dra bar spros pa'i chos can no //
translated: the phenomena of proliferation are like the branches.

original: de yang dngos 'khor ba'o //
analyzed: de yang dngos 'khor ba'o //
translated: Further, the trunk is the entity of samsāra.

original: lo ma dang me tog dang 'dra bar sku dang ye shes so //
analyzed: lo ma dang me tog dang 'dra bar sku dang ye shes so //
translated: The leaves and flowers are the kāyas and pristine consciousnesses.

original: 'bras bu dang 'dra ba rtogs pa'i chos sku'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu dang 'dra ba rtogs pa'i chos sku'o //
translated: The Dharma Body is the realization that is similar to the result.🔽The excellent vase is the supreme greatness.

original: bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog / ces pa rin po che'i spubs na gnas dgos pa grub pa dang 'dra bar chos sku bum pa chen po de'i nang nas ye shes kyi myu gu chen po lnga 'byung ste /
analyzed: bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog / ces pa rin po che'i spubs na gnas dgos pa grub pa dang 'dra bar chos sku bum pa chen po de'i nang nas ye shes kyi myu gu chen po lnga 'byung ste /
translated: Just as it is necessary for the great vase to be filled with jewels, the five great sprouts of pristine consciousness arise from within that great vase of the dharmakāya.

original: de las rin po che'i sku lnga gsal te /
analyzed: de las rin po che'i sku lnga gsal te /
translated: The five precious kāyas manifest from that.

original: de las thugs rje sprul pa'i sku byung nas sems can gyi don byed de nang nas nor bu rin po che'i mdzod phyung ba'o //
analyzed: de las thugs rje sprul pa'i sku byung nas sems can gyi don byed de nang nas nor bu rin po che'i mdzod phyung ba'o //
translated: The nirmāṇakāya of compassion arises from that and benefits sentient beings.

original: byed pa sems can kun don byed //
analyzed: byed pa sems can kun don byed //
translated: The activity is the benefit for all sentient beings.

original: ces pa sku gnyis kyis so //
analyzed: ces pa sku gnyis kyis so //
translated: That is the benefit of the two kāyas.

original: phan 'dogs sems can mnyes gshin pa //
analyzed: phan 'dogs sems can mnyes gshin pa //
translated: The benefit is the loving kindness of sentient beings.

original: zhes pa dang // bzang ngan shes shing dus shes pa //
analyzed: zhes pa dang // bzang ngan shes shing dus shes pa //
translated: Knowing good and bad and knowing time

original: zhes pa 'khor ba'i snod kyi bye brag dang gdul bya skabs la bab ma bab mkhyen pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa 'khor ba'i snod kyi bye brag dang gdul bya skabs la bab ma bab mkhyen pa'o //
translated: means knowing the specific vessels of samsara and knowing whether the occasion of the disciples has arrived or not.

original: khyab bdag dam shes dam tshig ldan //
analyzed: khyab bdag dam shes dam tshig ldan //
translated: The lord of the maṇḍala is endowed with samaya.

original: zhes pa rig pa'i ye shes kyi don shes shing de dang mi 'bral ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa rig pa'i ye shes kyi don shes shing de dang mi 'bral ba'o //
translated: This means to know the meaning of the wisdom of awareness and to be inseparable from it.

original: de yang rjes 'dug gi rtsa ba'i dam tshig gsum gyi gzungs thub pa'o //
analyzed: de yang rjes 'dug gi rtsa ba'i dam tshig gsum gyi gzungs thub pa'o //
translated: Moreover, it means to be able to keep the three root samayas of following.

original: 'du shes sems can dbang don shes //🔽zhes pa gdul bya skabs la bab ma bab dang / sems can @52a * //
analyzed: 'du shes sems can dbang don shes // zhes pa gdul bya skabs la bab ma bab dang / sems can @52a * //
translated: He knows the perceptions, beings, faculties, and aims.

original: gyi bsam pa mkhyen pa'o //
analyzed: gyi bsam pa mkhyen pa'o //
translated: This means to know whether the time is right to tame disciples and to know the thoughts of sentient beings.

original: de yang shes rab rno rtul la sogs pa mkhyen pa'o //🔽rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po //
analyzed: de yang shes rab rno rtul la sogs pa mkhyen pa'o // rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po //
translated: Moreover, it means to know their sharp or dull faculties, and so on.🔽He is skilled in the three liberations.

original: zhes ba rnam pa gsum las grol ba la mkhas pa ste /
analyzed: zhes ba rnam pa gsum las grol ba la mkhas pa ste /
translated: This means to be skilled in the three liberations.

original: yul sems lus dang gsum mo //
analyzed: yul sems lus dang gsum mo //
translated: The three are the object, mind, and body.

original: rnam grol gsum du grol ba la mkhas te rab 'bring tha ma'o //
analyzed: rnam grol gsum du grol ba la mkhas te rab 'bring tha ma'o //
translated: He is skilled in the three liberations, which are superior, middling, and lesser.

original: yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes //
analyzed: yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes //
translated: He has qualities and knows qualities.

original: zhes pa gzhi'i yon tan dang zhing gi yon tan shes pa'o //🔽dngos sku dang ye shes so //
analyzed: zhes pa gzhi'i yon tan dang zhing gi yon tan shes pa'o // dngos sku dang ye shes so //
translated: This means to know the qualities of the basis and the qualities of the field.🔽The qualities of the basis are the dharmakāya and the qualities of the field are the pristine consciousnesses.

original: chos shes bkra shis bkra shis 'byung //
analyzed: chos shes bkra shis bkra shis 'byung //
translated: He knows phenomena, is auspicious, and arises as auspiciousness.

original: zhes pa chos can dang chos nyid kyi don ma 'dres par ji lta bar shes pa de'i don rang chas su gnas par sdug bsngal gyi mtha' las grol ba ni bkra shis pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa chos can dang chos nyid kyi don ma 'dres par ji lta bar shes pa de'i don rang chas su gnas par sdug bsngal gyi mtha' las grol ba ni bkra shis pa ste /
translated: This is the auspiciousness of being free from the extreme of suffering, the meaning of which is the inseparability of the object of knowledge and the knower, just as it is, abiding as one's own attribute.

original: bkra shis thams cad kyi rtsa bar 'byung ngo //
analyzed: bkra shis thams cad kyi rtsa bar 'byung ngo //
translated: The root of all auspiciousness arises.

original: don rig pa'i ye shes de bkra shis thams cad yon tan du gnas pas na bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa'o //
analyzed: don rig pa'i ye shes de bkra shis thams cad yon tan du gnas pas na bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa'o //
translated: Since the meaning of the pristine consciousness of vidya abides as the quality of all auspiciousness, it is the auspiciousness of all auspiciousness.

original: grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge / zhes pa /
analyzed: grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge / zhes pa /
translated: The auspiciousness of fame is the virtue of renown.

original: rig pa dang ye shes kun gyi ngo bor gnas to /
analyzed: rig pa dang ye shes kun gyi ngo bor gnas to /
translated: It abides as the essence of all vidya and pristine consciousness.

original: bdag gzhan gyi dpal gyi gnas su gyur pa dang yon tan thams cad dri ma med par grags pa dang / ma bsags pa'i tshogs gnyis la dgyes pa'i ngo bo nyid las dge ba'o //
analyzed: bdag gzhan gyi dpal gyi gnas su gyur pa dang yon tan thams cad dri ma med par grags pa dang / ma bsags pa'i tshogs gnyis la dgyes pa'i ngo bo nyid las dge ba'o //
translated: Since it is the abode of the glory of self and other and all qualities are renowned to be stainless, it is virtuous by nature, without the accumulation of the two accumulations.

original: dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che //
analyzed: dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che //
translated: It is the great relief and great celebration.

original: zhes pa don sku gsum ye shes lnga rtogs na bya brtsal bya mi dgos par sdug bsngal zhi bas na'o ;
analyzed: zhes pa don sku gsum ye shes lnga rtogs na bya brtsal bya mi dgos par sdug bsngal zhi bas na'o ;
translated: If the meaning of the three kayas and the five pristine consciousnesses is realized, since suffering is pacified without the need for deliberate action,

original: / de yang yon tan gyi sgo yangs pas rtsal phyogs med du 'char ba'o //
analyzed: / de yang yon tan gyi sgo yangs pas rtsal phyogs med du 'char ba'o //
translated: Moreover, since the door of qualities is vast, the potential arises in every way.

original: dga' chen rol mo chen po pa //
analyzed: dga' chen rol mo chen po pa //
translated: The great play of great joy🔽means that the ornaments and play of the world and beings arise as the

original: zhes pa snang srid rgyan dang rol par shar te rig pa rang snang ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa snang srid rgyan dang rol par shar te rig pa rang snang ba'o //
translated: self-appearance of vidyā.

original: bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs //
translated: Perfect honor and service🔽means that the sense objects are the great peak of meditative concentration

original: zhes pa 'dod yon dgag sgrub med pa bsam gtan gyi rtse chen por gyur pa'o//
analyzed: zhes pa 'dod yon dgag sgrub med pa bsam gtan gyi rtse chen por gyur pa'o//
translated: without blocking or acquiring.🔽Supreme

original: mchog tu zhes pa chos sku'o //
analyzed: mchog tu zhes pa chos sku'o //
translated: means the dharmakāya.🔽Joy

original: dga' ba zhes pa rang la yod pas bya brtsal bya mi dgos so //
analyzed: dga' ba zhes pa rang la yod pas bya brtsal bya mi dgos so //
translated: means that since it exists in oneself, it is unnecessary to make effort.🔽Renown

original: grags zhes pa yon tan 'khor 'das su snang ngo //
analyzed: grags zhes pa yon tan 'khor 'das su snang ngo //
translated: means that qualities appear as samsāra and nirvāṇa.🔽Self

original: bdag ces pa rig pa bdag por gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ces pa rig pa bdag por gyur pa'o //
translated: means that vidyā becomes the lord.🔽Splendor

original: dpal zhes pa yon tan gyi sku gnyis gdul bya la shar ba'o //
analyzed: dpal zhes pa yon tan gyi sku gnyis gdul bya la shar ba'o //
translated: means that the two kāyas of qualities arise for those to be tamed.🔽Supreme

original: mchog ces pa sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa'o //
analyzed: mchog ces pa sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa'o //
translated: means the three kāyas without meeting and parting.🔽Endowed

original: ldan zhes pa rig pa'o //
analyzed: ldan zhes pa rig pa'o //
translated: means vidyā.🔽Bestower of the supreme

original: mchog sbyin zhes pa rtsal sku dang ye shes su shar ba'o //
analyzed: mchog sbyin zhes pa rtsal sku dang ye shes su shar ba'o //
translated: means the potential arises as the kāyas and pristine consciousnesses.🔽The principal one

original: gtso bo ste zhes pa rnam snang rig pa'i sku lnga'o //
analyzed: gtso bo ste zhes pa rnam snang rig pa'i sku lnga'o //
translated: means the five kāyas of vidyā of Vairocana.

original: skyabs kyi dam pa skyabs kyi 'os //
analyzed: skyabs kyi dam pa skyabs kyi 'os //
translated: The best of refuges, the worthy refuge.

original: zhes pa de'i thugs rje'i sprul pa'i sku drug go //
analyzed: zhes pa de'i thugs rje'i sprul pa'i sku drug go //
translated: The six emanation bodies of his compassion.🔽The enemy of the world, the best of the best,

original: 'jig rten dgra ste rab kyi mchog / ces @52b pa 'jig rten 'khrul ba'i dgrar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten dgra ste rab kyi mchog / ces @52b pa 'jig rten 'khrul ba'i dgrar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The one who becomes the enemy of the world's confusion.

original: de yang 'khrul snang 'joms pa'i mchog tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de yang 'khrul snang 'joms pa'i mchog tu gyur pa'o //
translated: Moreover, he is the best of the destroyers of confused appearances.

original: 'jigs pa ma lus sel ba po //
analyzed: 'jigs pa ma lus sel ba po //
translated: The one who removes all fear without exception.

original: zhes pa thugs rjes sdug bsngal dang 'jigs pa las skyob pa'o //🔽gtsug phud phud pu lcang lo can //
analyzed: zhes pa thugs rjes sdug bsngal dang 'jigs pa las skyob pa'o // gtsug phud phud pu lcang lo can //
translated: With compassion, he protects from suffering and fear.🔽The one with a topknot and curls,

original: zhes pa dang / ral pa munydza cod pan thogs //
analyzed: zhes pa dang / ral pa munydza cod pan thogs //
translated: And the one with a topknot of matted hair and a crown.

original: zhes pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor nyid las mi zhan pa'i rigs lnga'o //
analyzed: zhes pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor nyid las mi zhan pa'i rigs lnga'o //
translated: The five families who are not inferior to the retinue of the saṃbhogakāya.

original: de yang ye shes lnga'i thugs te he ru ka lnga dang ldan zhing ye shes kyi ma dangs dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: de yang ye shes lnga'i thugs te he ru ka lnga dang ldan zhing ye shes kyi ma dangs dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Moreover, the mind of the five pristine consciousnesses, endowed with the five herukas, together with the pure essence of pristine consciousness.

original: gdong lta gtsug phud lnga dang ldan //🔽zhes pa rnam snang kun du zhal lo //
analyzed: gdong lta gtsug phud lnga dang ldan //🔽zhes pa rnam snang kun du zhal lo //
translated: The one with five topknots and a face looking upward.🔽The one with the face of Vairocana looking upward.

original: de yang ye shes kyi he ru ka dbu la rgyas 'debs su thogs pa'o //
analyzed: de yang ye shes kyi he ru ka dbu la rgyas 'debs su thogs pa'o //
translated: The wisdom Heruka is placed on the head as a seal.

original: zur phud lnga pa me tog thod //
analyzed: zur phud lnga pa me tog thod //
translated: The five-crested one holds a flower and a skull cup.

original: mgo zlum brtul zhugs chen po 'chang //
analyzed: mgo zlum brtul zhugs chen po 'chang //
translated: The one with a shaved head holds the great vow.

original: zhes pa longs sku'i thugs rje mi mthun pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa longs sku'i thugs rje mi mthun pa'o //
translated: These are the different forms of compassion of the enjoyment body.

original: tshangs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog / ces ba dang / dka' thub mthar phyin dka' thub che //
analyzed: tshangs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog / ces ba dang / dka' thub mthar phyin dka' thub che //
translated: The one who practices celibacy holds the supreme vow, and the one who has perfected asceticism is the great ascetic.

original: zhes pa thub pa de rnams kyis so //
analyzed: zhes pa thub pa de rnams kyis so //
translated: These are the sages.

original: gtsang gnas dam pa goo tam //
analyzed: gtsang gnas dam pa goo tam //
translated: The pure one of the pure abodes is Gautama.

original: zhes ba thub pa'i dgongs pa dag pa dang spyod pa dag pa ste //
analyzed: zhes ba thub pa'i dgongs pa dag pa dang spyod pa dag pa ste //
translated: This refers to the pure intention and pure conduct of the sages.

original: 'byed pa med pa'i shes rab la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'byed pa med pa'i shes rab la gnas pa'o //
translated: They abide in the wisdom that is free from differentiation.

original: bram ze tshangs pa tshangs pa shes //
analyzed: bram ze tshangs pa tshangs pa shes //
translated: The brahmin is Brahma, the knower of Brahma.

original: zhes pa chos sku rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa chos sku rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: This refers to the pure dharmakaya.

original: de'i don shes shing dgongs pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de'i don shes shing dgongs pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He knows the meaning of that and possesses the intention.

original: 'bras bu gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'bras bu gang zhe na /
translated: What is the result?

original: mya ngan 'das pa'i tshangs pa thob pa'o //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa'i tshangs pa thob pa'o //
translated: The attainment of the Brahma of nirvana.

original: ji ltar thob ce na //
analyzed: ji ltar thob ce na //
translated: How is it attained?

original: grol ba thar pa rnam grol lus //
analyzed: grol ba thar pa rnam grol lus //
translated: Liberation, freedom, and the liberated body.

original: zhes bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ste /
translated: This is what is said.

original: yul sems lus las grol zhing 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las thar te /
analyzed: yul sems lus las grol zhing 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las thar te /
translated: one is liberated from the ocean of samsara.

original: dbang po yang rab ni 'jug pa dang snang ba dang / shes pa dang grol ba dus mnyam pa'o//
analyzed: dbang po yang rab ni 'jug pa dang snang ba dang / shes pa dang grol ba dus mnyam pa'o//
translated: The best of the best simultaneously enters, appears, is recognized, and is liberated.

original: 'bring po bsam gtan lnga pas mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: 'bring po bsam gtan lnga pas mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: The middling one attains nirvana through the five concentrations.

original: de yang gang grol yang bar du sku lnga tshom bu dang bcas par gsal lo //
analyzed: de yang gang grol yang bar du sku lnga tshom bu dang bcas par gsal lo //
translated: Moreover, even though one is liberated, the five kāyas and clusters manifest in the bardo.

original: tha ma rin chen sbubs na sku gsum na gsal ba'o //
analyzed: tha ma rin chen sbubs na sku gsum na gsal ba'o //
translated: The least clear one is the three kāyas in the precious vessel.

original: rnam grol zhes pa chos las grol ba'o //
analyzed: rnam grol zhes pa chos las grol ba'o //
translated: “Liberation” is liberation from phenomena.

original: zhi ba zhes pa gzhi'i chos nyid do //
analyzed: zhi ba zhes pa gzhi'i chos nyid do //
translated: “Peace” is the dharmatā of the basis.

original: zhi ba nyid ces pa rang de'i ngang la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhi ba nyid ces pa rang de'i ngang la gnas pa'o //
translated: “Peaceful” is abiding in one’s own state.

original: mya ngan 'das zhes pa gzhi'o //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das zhes pa gzhi'o //
translated: “Nirvana” is the basis.

original: mya ngan 'das zhes pa sku lnga tshom bu dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das zhes pa sku lnga tshom bu dang bcas pa'o //
translated: “Attained nirvana” is the five kāyas and clusters.

original: legs par zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar grol ba ltar grol bas lam ma nor ba'o //
analyzed: legs par zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar grol ba ltar grol bas lam ma nor ba'o //
translated: “Well” is the unmistaken path because one is liberated as the tathāgatas were liberated.

original: mya ngan 'das dang nye zhes pa thugs rje sprul pa'i sku dang de'i grol ba'i @53a * //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das dang nye zhes pa thugs rje sprul pa'i sku dang de'i grol ba'i @53a * //
translated: It is said, It is close to nirvana.🔽🔽

original: yid kyi sku'o //🔽bde sdug sel ba'i mthar gyur pa //
analyzed: yid kyi sku'o // bde sdug sel ba'i mthar gyur pa //
translated: The line close to nirvana refers to the mind-made body and the emanation body.

original: zhes pa sprul skus 'gro don byas nas slar mya ngan las 'das pa'o //🔽chags bral lus las 'das pa po //
analyzed: zhes pa sprul skus 'gro don byas nas slar mya ngan las 'das pa'o // chags bral lus las 'das pa po //
translated: The line the end of the removal of happiness and suffering refers to the emanation body's activity for the sake of beings and then to nirvana.

original: zhes pa rin chen sbubs so //
analyzed: zhes pa rin chen sbubs so //
translated: The line free from attachment, beyond the body refers to the precious enclosure.

original: thub pa med pa dpe med pa de lhag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: thub pa med pa dpe med pa de lhag pa med pa'o //
translated: The line incomparable, without example refers to the absence of remainder.

original: dpe med pa zhes pa gang gis kyang de'i phyogs la dpe mi btub pa'o //
analyzed: dpe med pa zhes pa gang gis kyang de'i phyogs la dpe mi btub pa'o //
translated: The line without example means that nothing can be used as an example for it.

original: mi mngon zhes pa mya ngan 'das sku phyir mi mngon pa'o //
analyzed: mi mngon zhes pa mya ngan 'das sku phyir mi mngon pa'o //
translated: The line unapparent means that the body of nirvana is not apparent.

original: mi snang zhes pa sku lnga po gdul bya la mi snang ngo //
analyzed: mi snang zhes pa sku lnga po gdul bya la mi snang ngo //
translated: The line invisible means that the five bodies are not visible to those to be tamed.

original: gsal byed min zhes pa sku lnga la thugs rje mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gsal byed min zhes pa sku lnga la thugs rje mi 'gyur te /
translated: The line not a clarifier means that compassion does not change in the five bodies.

original: nyon mongs pa dang blo'i rtog pa mi sel lo //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang blo'i rtog pa mi sel lo //
translated: The line not a remover means that it does not remove afflictions and conceptual thoughts.

original: mi 'gyur zhes pa phyis rgyu 'bras bur smin nas 'bras bu rgyur mi ldog go //
analyzed: mi 'gyur zhes pa phyis rgyu 'bras bur smin nas 'bras bu rgyur mi ldog go //
translated: The line unchanging means that later, when the cause ripens as the result, the result does not revert to the cause.

original: kun 'gro ba zhes pa buddh'i dur sa'o //
analyzed: kun 'gro ba zhes pa buddh'i dur sa'o //
translated: The omnipresent is the cremation ground of Buddha.

original: khyab pa po zhes pa rin chen sbubs la nub pa med pa nam mkha' lta bu'o //
analyzed: khyab pa po zhes pa rin chen sbubs la nub pa med pa nam mkha' lta bu'o //
translated: The pervading is the jewel casket, which is like the sky, without setting.

original: phra zhing zhes pa don de brtag dka' ba'o //
analyzed: phra zhing zhes pa don de brtag dka' ba'o //
translated: The subtle is that meaning which is difficult to examine.

original: zag med sa bon bral zhes pa rtogs pa dang ldan pa la 'khor ba'i sa bon mi gnas pa'o //🔽rdul med rdul bral dri ma med //
analyzed: zag med sa bon bral zhes pa rtogs pa dang ldan pa la 'khor ba'i sa bon mi gnas pa'o // rdul med rdul bral dri ma med //
translated: The free from the seed of defilement is that for one who has realization, the seed of samsara does not abide.

original: ces pa mya ngan 'das nas nyon mongs pa zhe sdang la sogs pa mi gnas shing bral ba'o //🔽nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa //
analyzed: ces pa mya ngan 'das nas nyon mongs pa zhe sdang la sogs pa mi gnas shing bral ba'o // nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa //
translated: The stainless, free from dust is that after nirvana, the afflictions such as anger do not abide and are absent.

original: zhes pa chos sku la nyes pa ngang gis spangs pa ste rtag chad la sogs pa'i skyon med do //
analyzed: zhes pa chos sku la nyes pa ngang gis spangs pa ste rtag chad la sogs pa'i skyon med do //
translated: The faultless, free from faults is that in the dharmakaya, faults are naturally abandoned, and there are no faults such as eternalism and nihilism.

original: shin tu sad pa sang pa'i bdag / ces pa /
analyzed: shin tu sad pa sang pa'i bdag / ces pa /
translated: The well-awakened, awakened one is as follows.

original: dper na 'jig rten pa'i rmi lam sad pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: dper na 'jig rten pa'i rmi lam sad pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur te /
translated: For example, it is like waking up from a worldly dream.

original: ma rig pa'i gnyid sad nas rig pa'i mar me nang na gsal ba'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i gnyid sad nas rig pa'i mar me nang na gsal ba'o //
translated: Having awakened from the sleep of ignorance, the lamp of awareness is clear.

original: kun shes kun rig dam pa po //
analyzed: kun shes kun rig dam pa po //
translated: The knower of all, knower of everything is as follows.

original: zhes pa / rin po che'i sbubs na kun gyi shes pa dang rig pa gnyis med par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa / rin po che'i sbubs na kun gyi shes pa dang rig pa gnyis med par gnas pa'o //
translated: The mind and awareness of all are present in the precious enclosure without duality.

original: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das //
translated: The dharmata of consciousness is beyond.

original: zhes pa da lta'i shes pa rtog bcas 'di las grol zhes pa /
analyzed: zhes pa da lta'i shes pa rtog bcas 'di las grol zhes pa /
translated: This means that the present consciousness is liberated from this conceptualization.

original: 'o na ji ltar gnas she na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar gnas she na /
translated: Well then, how does it abide?

original: ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba //
analyzed: ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba //
translated: Wisdom is held in the manner of nonduality.

original: zhes pa stong pa ye shes kyi snying po can du gnas te /
analyzed: zhes pa stong pa ye shes kyi snying po can du gnas te /
translated: This means that it abides as the essence of the wisdom of emptiness.

original: rig pa'i nang na ye shes gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rig pa'i nang na ye shes gnas pa'o //
translated: Wisdom abides within vidya.

original: don gnyis med par snang ba mi 'gag pa'o //
analyzed: don gnyis med par snang ba mi 'gag pa'o //
translated: The appearance of the nondual object is unceasing.

original: rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub //
analyzed: rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub //
translated: Nonconceptual and spontaneously present.

original: ces pa sku gsum nang gsal du gnas te /
analyzed: ces pa sku gsum nang gsal du gnas te /
translated: This means that the three kayas abide as inner clarity.

original: bag chags kyi dbugs med pas 'dzin rtog mi rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: bag chags kyi dbugs med pas 'dzin rtog mi rgyu ba'o //
translated: Since there is no exhalation of traces, the concepts of grasping do not move.

original: dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa //
analyzed: dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa //
translated: The activity of the buddhas of the three times.

original: zhes pa thugs rje'i sprul sku drug gis dus gsum gyi buddh'i phrin las 'gro @53b ba sgrol ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa thugs rje'i sprul sku drug gis dus gsum gyi buddh'i phrin las 'gro @53b ba sgrol ba'o //
translated: This means that the six emanations of compassion liberate migrating beings through the activity of the buddhas of the three times.

original: sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med //
translated: The buddha has no beginning or end.

original: ces pa dang po dang tha ma'i dus med ba ste ye shes pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa dang po dang tha ma'i dus med ba ste ye shes pa'o //
translated: The first and last times do not exist, so it is pristine wisdom.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pas so //
analyzed: dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pas so //
translated: Because the first buddha is without cause.

original: de yang don rang byung gi ye shes so //
analyzed: de yang don rang byung gi ye shes so //
translated: Moreover, the meaning is naturally occurring pristine wisdom.

original: ye shes mig gcig dri ma med //
analyzed: ye shes mig gcig dri ma med //
translated: The one eye of pristine wisdom is immaculate.

original: ces pa rin po che'i lus la ye shes kyi spyan rnam par dag pa gsal ba'o //
analyzed: ces pa rin po che'i lus la ye shes kyi spyan rnam par dag pa gsal ba'o //
translated: The eye of pristine wisdom is clear in the precious body.

original: ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs //
translated: The Tathāgata has a body of pristine wisdom.

original: zhes pa rin po che'i 'od 'bar ba'i sku lnga'o //
analyzed: zhes pa rin po che'i 'od 'bar ba'i sku lnga'o //
translated: The five kāyas of the blazing light of the precious gem.

original: tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che //
analyzed: tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che //
translated: The lord of speech is the great speaker.

original: zhes pa don ngo mtshar can gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa don ngo mtshar can gsungs pa'o //
translated: The meaning is said to be amazing.

original: smra ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i rgyal //
analyzed: smra ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i rgyal //
translated: The supreme speaker is the king of speakers.

original: zhes pa gzhan pas lhag par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa gzhan pas lhag par gyur pa'o //
translated: It is superior to others.

original: smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas //
analyzed: smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas //
translated: The supreme speaker is the supreme place.

original: zhes pa gsungs pa'i don khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa gsungs pa'i don khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the teaching is superior.

original: smra ba'i seng ge mtshungs pa med //
analyzed: smra ba'i seng ge mtshungs pa med //
translated: The incomparable lion of speakers.

original: ces pa don nges par sgrogs pa ston pa la 'gran nus pa med pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa don nges par sgrogs pa ston pa la 'gran nus pa med pa'o //
translated: The meaning is proclaimed with certainty. No one can rival the teacher.

original: kun du lta ba mchog tu dga' //
analyzed: kun du lta ba mchog tu dga' //
translated: The all-seeing one, the most delightful.

original: zhes pa chos sku zad thal lo //
analyzed: zhes pa chos sku zad thal lo //
translated: This is the exhaustion of the dharmakāya.

original: gzi brjid phung po blta na sdub //
analyzed: gzi brjid phung po blta na sdub //
translated: The mass of splendor, the one to be seen with pleasure.

original: ces pa ye shes kyi bag chags kyi lus can zil gyis gnon cing mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa ye shes kyi bag chags kyi lus can zil gyis gnon cing mdzes pa'o //
translated: This is the body of the traces of pristine consciousness that is overwhelming and beautiful.

original: 'od bzangs 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u //
analyzed: 'od bzangs 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u //
translated: The one with good light, the blazing one, the glorious knot.

original: zhes pa thugs rig pa'i ye shes rin po che 'od 'bar pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa thugs rig pa'i ye shes rin po che 'od 'bar pa'o //
translated: This is the blazing light of the precious pristine consciousness of vidyā.

original: lag na 'od 'bar snang ba po //
analyzed: lag na 'od 'bar snang ba po //
translated: The one with light in the hand, the illuminator.

original: zhes pa thugs rjes 'gro ba'i ma rig pa sel ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa thugs rjes 'gro ba'i ma rig pa sel ba'o //
translated: This is the dispeller of the ignorance of migrating beings with compassion.

original: sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste //
analyzed: sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste //
translated: The supreme great physician, the chief.

original: zug rdu 'byin pa bla na med //
analyzed: zug rdu 'byin pa bla na med //
translated: The one who removes the thorn, the unsurpassed.

original: sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing //
analyzed: sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing //
translated: The tree of all the remaining medicines.

original: zhes pa dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa sprul pa'i sku rnams kyis nyon mongs pa'i dug dang gzung 'dzin 'joms pa ste sku gsum ye shes bzhi brtsis pas rlung mkhris sel ba las mchog tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa sprul pa'i sku rnams kyis nyon mongs pa'i dug dang gzung 'dzin 'joms pa ste sku gsum ye shes bzhi brtsis pas rlung mkhris sel ba las mchog tu gyur pa'o //
translated: This is the destruction of the poison of affliction and the grasping of subject and object by the nirmāṇakāya, such as the glorious Vajrasattva.

original: sdu gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog / ces pa sprul sku'o //
analyzed: sdu gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog / ces pa sprul sku'o //
translated: The handsome one, the supreme of the three worlds.🔽This is the nirmāṇakāya.

original: dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can //
analyzed: dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can //
translated: He is the glorious one with the mandala of the stars.

original: zhes pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku las sprul sku nyi ma dang zer bzhin 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku las sprul sku nyi ma dang zer bzhin 'byung ba'o //
translated: This means that the emanation body arises from the enjoyment body like the sun and its rays.🔽He has well planted the victory banner of the Dharma

original: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug par //🔽chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs //
analyzed: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug par // chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs //
translated: in the ten directions, to the ends of space.

original: zhes pa sangs rgyas kyi sprul pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rim gyis 'dzin te /
analyzed: zhes pa sangs rgyas kyi sprul pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rim gyis 'dzin te /
translated: This means that the emanations of the Buddha gradually uphold the teachings of the Buddha.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la sprul pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung bas sems can gyi don zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la sprul pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung bas sems can gyi don zhes pa'o //
translated: Since the emanations of the body of the Tathagata arise uninterruptedly, it is said that he benefits sentient beings.

original: 'gron gdugs gcig yangs pa ste //
analyzed: 'gron gdugs gcig yangs pa ste //
translated: He is the one with the vast parasol of guests,

original: byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor @54a * //
analyzed: byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor @54a * //
translated: the one with the mandala of love and compassion.

original: can ; / zhes pa phyogs ris med pa'i snying rje dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: can ; / zhes pa phyogs ris med pa'i snying rje dang ldan pa'o //
translated: This means that he has compassion that is free of bias.

original: de yang don gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: de yang don gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa'o //
translated: Moreover, it is the form of the mandala of the meaning.

original: dpal ldan padma gar gyi bdag / ces pa don mdzad pa'i thabs dang ldan pas na /
analyzed: dpal ldan padma gar gyi bdag / ces pa don mdzad pa'i thabs dang ldan pas na /
translated: He is the glorious one, the lord of the dance of the lotus.

original: don grub la rang la 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'o //
analyzed: don grub la rang la 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'o //
translated: This means that since he has the means to accomplish the meaning, he is not tainted by the faults of samsara.

original: khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs //
analyzed: khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs //
translated: The great all-pervading one is the precious parasol.

original: zhes pa rin po che dang 'dra //
analyzed: zhes pa rin po che dang 'dra //
translated: This is like a precious gem.

original: gdugs dang 'dra /
analyzed: gdugs dang 'dra /
translated: It is like a parasol.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi bzi brjid che //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi bzi brjid che //
translated: The great splendor of all buddhas

original: zhes pa nyon mongs pa dang 'khor ba zil gyis gnon pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa nyon mongs pa dang 'khor ba zil gyis gnon pa'o //
translated: is the splendor that overwhelms afflictions and samsara.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku 'chang ba //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku 'chang ba //
translated: The body of all buddhas

original: zhes pa rig pa la ye shes kyi sku lnga rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa rig pa la ye shes kyi sku lnga rdzogs pa'o //
translated: is the perfection of the five kāyas of pristine consciousness in vidyā.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor can //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor can //
translated: The yoga of all buddhas

original: zhes pa sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa dang ldan pas na'o //
analyzed: zhes pa sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa dang ldan pas na'o //
translated: is endowed with the transcendent state of all buddhas.🔽The single teaching of all buddhas

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig / ces pa don gyi dgongs pa la gcig las mi mnga' bas na sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig go //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig / ces pa don gyi dgongs pa la gcig las mi mnga' bas na sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig go //
translated: is the single transcendent state of the meaning of all buddhas.

original: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal //
translated: The glorious empowerment of the precious vajra

original: zhes pa rig pa rtsal gyi dbang ste /
analyzed: zhes pa rig pa rtsal gyi dbang ste /
translated: is the empowerment of the potential of vidyā.

original: de yang phyi bum pa'i dbang /
analyzed: de yang phyi bum pa'i dbang /
translated: Further, the outer empowerment is the vase empowerment.

original: rin po che myu gu'i dbang dang / nang rgyal rtags phyag rgya'i dbang dang / shes rab rig pa'i sku lnga'i dbang dang / gsang ba'i dbang de kho na nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: rin po che myu gu'i dbang dang / nang rgyal rtags phyag rgya'i dbang dang / shes rab rig pa'i sku lnga'i dbang dang / gsang ba'i dbang de kho na nyid ces bya'o //
translated: The empowerment of the precious sprout, the empowerment of the inner sign of the mudra, the empowerment of the five bodies of wisdom awareness, and the secret empowerment called “suchness.”

original: de yang mtshon na rin po che sgra'i yi ge bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de yang mtshon na rin po che sgra'i yi ge bstan pa'o //
translated: Moreover, the precious syllables are illustrated and explained.

original: de nas rig pa rtsal gyi dbang mtshan ma la brten pa'o //
analyzed: de nas rig pa rtsal gyi dbang mtshan ma la brten pa'o //
translated: Then, the empowerment of the potential of awareness is based on a sign.

original: rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste //
analyzed: rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste //
translated: The lord of all jewels is the lord.

original: zhes pa rig pa chos sku thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa rig pa chos sku thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa'o //
translated: Awareness is the dharmakāya, the lord of all.🔽The lord of all lords of the world

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag / ces pa rig pa'i rtsal gong du ma shar la /
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag / ces pa rig pa'i rtsal gong du ma shar la /
translated: is the potential of awareness that does not arise above.

original: 'du yang de nyid dang du 'du bas bdag po lta bur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'du yang de nyid dang du 'du bas bdag po lta bur gyur pa'o //
translated: Since it also gathers into that, it is like a lord.

original: rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje //
translated: The lord of all vajra holders

original: zhes pa rig pa chos sku'o //
analyzed: zhes pa rig pa chos sku'o //
translated: is the dharmakāya of awareness.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba //
translated: The great mind of all buddhas

original: zhes pa rig pa rang byung gi ye shes so //
analyzed: zhes pa rig pa rang byung gi ye shes so //
translated: is the self-originated pristine consciousness of awareness.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas //
translated: It exists in the mind of all buddhas.

original: zhes pa bzhugs pa'i gnas te /
analyzed: zhes pa bzhugs pa'i gnas te /
translated: This is the place where it abides.

original: tsitta rin po che na gnas //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: tsitta rin po che na gnas // zhes gsungs so //
translated: It abides in the precious heart.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba //
translated: The great body of all the Buddhas.

original: zhes pa ye shes kyi sku ste lhun grub chen po'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ye shes kyi sku ste lhun grub chen po'o //
translated: This is the body of pristine cognition, the great spontaneous presence.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin //
translated: It is also the speech of all the Buddhas.

original: zhes pa rang byung gi ye shes 'gag pa med pa'i rtsal lo //
analyzed: zhes pa rang byung gi ye shes 'gag pa med pa'i rtsal lo //
translated: This is the unceasing expressive power of naturally present pristine cognition.

original: rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che //
translated: The vajra sun is the great radiance.

original: zhes pa thabs 'gag pa med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: zhes pa thabs 'gag pa med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: This is the unceasing pristine cognition of skilful means.

original: rdo rje zla ba dri @54b med 'od //
analyzed: rdo rje zla ba dri @54b med 'od //
translated: The vajra moon is the radiance of immaculate light.

original: ces pa shes rab 'gyur ba med pa'i chos nyid ngang gis 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: ces pa shes rab 'gyur ba med pa'i chos nyid ngang gis 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: This is the unchanging reality which is the pristine cognition of discriminative awareness, naturally radiant.

original: rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas //
analyzed: rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas //
translated: The perfect Buddha is seated in the vajra posture.

original: zhes pa dgi ba dang ye shes de gzugs kyi skur grub pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa dgi ba dang ye shes de gzugs kyi skur grub pa'o //
translated: This is the accomplishment of the body of form of the pristine cognition and the expanse of reality.

original: sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa //
translated: The Buddha holds the attributes of living beings.

original: zhes pa gdul bya dang mthun par snang ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa gdul bya dang mthun par snang ba'o //
translated: This is the appearance in accordance with those to be trained.

original: dpal ldan sangs rgyas padma skyes //
analyzed: dpal ldan sangs rgyas padma skyes //
translated: The glorious Buddha is born from the lotus.

original: zhes pa sangs rgyas dang sems can rgyab gyes pa'i dus bdag gzhan gyi don thugs su chud pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa sangs rgyas dang sems can rgyab gyes pa'i dus bdag gzhan gyi don thugs su chud pa'o //
translated: This is the time when the Buddha has realized the aims of self and other, having turned away from the state of sentient beings.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rtogs pa skad cig ma la grub pa'o //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rtogs pa skad cig ma la grub pa'o //
translated: He is glorious Vajrasattva, who is accomplished in an instant.

original: kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa //
analyzed: kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa //
translated: He is the holder of the treasury of omniscient wisdom.

original: zhes pa ston pa thugs shes rab yongs su rgyas pa'i dus kun mkhyen te /
analyzed: zhes pa ston pa thugs shes rab yongs su rgyas pa'i dus kun mkhyen te /
translated: This is the time when the Teacher's wisdom mind is completely expanded, and he is omniscient.

original: ye shes kyi mdzod dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi mdzod dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He is endowed with the treasury of wisdom.

original: rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang //
analyzed: rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang //
translated: He is the king who holds the various magical displays.

original: zhes pa dbu'i gtsug tor la sogs pa las sprul ba'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phros pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa dbu'i gtsug tor la sogs pa las sprul ba'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phros pa'o //
translated: This is the inconceivable emanation body that radiates from the crown of his head and so forth.

original: dngos thugs rje 'gag pa med pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: dngos thugs rje 'gag pa med pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He is the one who is endowed with the great compassion that is unobstructed.

original: che ba sangs rgyas rig sngags 'chang /
analyzed: che ba sangs rgyas rig sngags 'chang /
translated: He is the great Buddha, the holder of the awareness mantra.

original: zhes pa gsang sngags thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa gsang sngags thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa'o //
translated: This is the one who has become the lord of all secret mantra.

original: rdo rje rnon po ral gri che //
analyzed: rdo rje rnon po ral gri che //
translated: He is the sharp vajra, the great sword.

original: zhes pa so sor rtog pa'i shes rab bo //
analyzed: zhes pa so sor rtog pa'i shes rab bo //
translated: This is the wisdom of discernment.

original: theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod //
analyzed: theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod //
translated: He is the Great Vehicle that cuts through suffering.

original: ces pa theg pa chen po'i 'bras bu rtogs pas sdug bsngal la gnas pa'i skabs med pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa theg pa chen po'i 'bras bu rtogs pas sdug bsngal la gnas pa'i skabs med pa'o //
translated: Thus, there is no occasion for abiding in suffering through the realization of the result of the Great Vehicle.

original: don rang chas rtsol ba dang bral pa'o //
analyzed: don rang chas rtsol ba dang bral pa'o //
translated: The meaning is that it is naturally endowed and free from effort.

original: mtshon cha chen po rdo rje'i chos //
analyzed: mtshon cha chen po rdo rje'i chos //
translated: The great weapon is the vajra Dharma.

original: zhes pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: zhes pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: This is the nondual pristine consciousness.🔽The profound vajra is jinajigi.

original: rdo rje zab mo dzi na dzig / ces pa nyan thos la sogs pa las rgyal ba las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur ba'i gsang sngags mchog go //
analyzed: rdo rje zab mo dzi na dzig / ces pa nyan thos la sogs pa las rgyal ba las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur ba'i gsang sngags mchog go //
translated: This is the supreme mantra that conquers the conquerors and is victorious over the hearers and so on.🔽Vajra wisdom knows the great meaning.

original: rdo rje blo gros don chen rig / ces pa dbyer med pa'i don mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje blo gros don chen rig / ces pa dbyer med pa'i don mi rtog pa'o //
translated: This is the nonconceptual meaning of indivisibility.

original: pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa //
analyzed: pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa //
translated: All perfections are complete.

original: zhes pa mnga' bas na'o //
analyzed: zhes pa mnga' bas na'o //
translated: This is because it is possessed.

original: sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan //
analyzed: sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan //
translated: It is endowed with the ornament of all stages.

original: zhes pa dang po rab tu dga' ba nas sa bcu pa man chod sprul sku'i sa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa dang po rab tu dga' ba nas sa bcu pa man chod sprul sku'i sa'o //
translated: This is the nirmāṇakāya stage from the first stage, Very Joyful, to the tenth stage.

original: shes rab kyi rtsal 'byongs pas so ;
analyzed: shes rab kyi rtsal 'byongs pas so ;
translated: Since the power of wisdom is trained,

original: / bcu gcig nas bcu bzhi'i bar du longs sku'i sa ste che ba'i ye shes mthar rdzogs pas sbrul pa'i sku'i sa ste /
analyzed: / bcu gcig nas bcu bzhi'i bar du longs sku'i sa ste che ba'i ye shes mthar rdzogs pas sbrul pa'i sku'i sa ste /
translated: From the eleventh to the fourteenth stages are the stage of the sambhogakaya, and since the great wisdom is perfected, it is the stage of the nirmanakaya.

original: sprul sku 'byin no //
analyzed: sprul sku 'byin no //
translated: The nirmanakaya is emanated.

original: zhing dag pa nges pa'i sa la sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: zhing dag pa nges pa'i sa la sbyor ba'o //
translated: The stage of the pure realm is connected to the stage of certainty.

original: bco lnga nas bcu drug tu mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa ste /🔽zhi ba'i chos kyi sku'i zhing ste 'byed pa @55a * //
analyzed: bco lnga nas bcu drug tu mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa ste / zhi ba'i chos kyi sku'i zhing ste 'byed pa @55a * //
translated: From the fifteenth to the sixteenth stages are the stage of nirvana.

original: med pa'i shes rab la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: med pa'i shes rab la gnas pa'o //
translated: The pure realm of the peaceful dharmakaya is the stage of the indivisible wisdom.

original: de yang don gyi phyogs cha re re nas brtsis ba'o //
analyzed: de yang don gyi phyogs cha re re nas brtsis ba'o //
translated: Those are counted from the perspective of individual aspects of the meaning.

original: rnam par dag pa bdag med chos //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa bdag med chos //
translated: The pure dharma of selflessness

original: zhes pa chos sku rin po che'i dbugs so //
analyzed: zhes pa chos sku rin po che'i dbugs so //
translated: is the sigh of the precious dharmakaya.

original: yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang //
analyzed: yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang //
translated: The good moonlight of perfect wisdom

original: zhes pa shes rab 'gyur ba med pa'i chos nyid ye shes kyi snang ba dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa shes rab 'gyur ba med pa'i chos nyid ye shes kyi snang ba dang bcas pa'o //
translated: is the unchanging dharmata of wisdom together with the appearance of wisdom.

original: brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste //
analyzed: brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste //
translated: The great diligence of the magical net

original: zhes pa rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i brtson 'grus min te /
analyzed: zhes pa rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i brtson 'grus min te /
translated: is not diligence with effort.

original: ye nas byas zin pa'i chos te da sdod byar med pa'o //
analyzed: ye nas byas zin pa'i chos te da sdod byar med pa'o //
translated: Dharma is primordially accomplished; there is no dharma to accomplish now.

original: rig pa 'gag pa med par gnas pas na'o //
analyzed: rig pa 'gag pa med par gnas pas na'o //
translated: Since awareness abides without ceasing, it is so.🔽The supreme lord of all tantras

original: rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog / ces pa tshig gi rgyud thams cad don gyi rgyud rigs las thams cad 'byung bas na rig pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog / ces pa tshig gi rgyud thams cad don gyi rgyud rigs las thams cad 'byung bas na rig pa'o //
translated: means that since all the meaning tantras arise from the family of awareness, it is awareness.

original: rdo rje'i gdan ni ma lus ldan //
analyzed: rdo rje'i gdan ni ma lus ldan //
translated: Endowed with all vajra seats

original: zhes pa thams cad chos nyid kyi dang la 'dug pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa thams cad chos nyid kyi dang la 'dug pa'o //
translated: means that all are included in the dharmatā of the view.

original: ye shes sku rnams ma lus ldan //
analyzed: ye shes sku rnams ma lus ldan //
translated: Endowed with all the jñānakāyas

original: zhes pa sku re re la yang ye shes lnga char rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa sku re re la yang ye shes lnga char rdzogs pa'o //
translated: means that all five of the jñānakāyas are complete in each kāya.

original: de dang rig pa ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de dang rig pa ldan pa'o //
translated: It is endowed with that awareness.

original: kun du bzang po blo gros bzang //
analyzed: kun du bzang po blo gros bzang //
translated: Samantabhadra, good intellect

original: zhes pa sems can gyi blo dang gros su mthun pa drug bzang ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa sems can gyi blo dang gros su mthun pa drug bzang ba'o //
translated: means that the six good ones are in accord with the intellect of sentient beings.

original: sa yi snying po 'gro ba 'dzin //
analyzed: sa yi snying po 'gro ba 'dzin //
translated: The heart of the earth, the holder of migrating beings

original: zhes pa bcu bzhi pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa la thugs rje lcags kyus zhing dag pa 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa bcu bzhi pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa la thugs rje lcags kyus zhing dag pa 'dzin pa'o //
translated: means that the hook of compassion on the fourteenth stage, the stage of Vajradhara, holds the pure field.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po can //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po can //
translated: Endowed with the heart of all buddhas

original: zhes pa rig pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa rig pa'o //
translated: means that awareness.

original: sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang //
analyzed: sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang //
translated: The various emanated wheels are held.

original: zhes pa rdo rje sems dpa' las sprul ba'i sku dug byung ba 'am yang na lus bar pa nas sprul pa 'gyed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa rdo rje sems dpa' las sprul ba'i sku dug byung ba 'am yang na lus bar pa nas sprul pa 'gyed pa'o //
translated: The emanation body that emanates from Vajrasattva or the emanation body that emanates from the middle body.🔽The supreme nature of all entities

original: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog / ces pa rigs drug snang ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog / ces pa rigs drug snang ba'o //
translated: is the appearance of the six families.

original: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin //🔽ces pa sprul pa'i sku drug gis so //
analyzed: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin // ces pa sprul pa'i sku drug gis so //
translated: The nature of all entities is held.

original: rigs drug so so'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: rigs drug so so'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The six emanation bodies hold the characteristics of each of the six families.🔽The unborn phenomena are

original: skye med chos de zhes pa yang dag pa'i don skye 'gag med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: skye med chos de zhes pa yang dag pa'i don skye 'gag med pa kho na'o //
translated: only the meaning of reality, which is neither produced nor stopped.

original: 'dul thabs su sna tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dul thabs su sna tshogs pa'o //
translated: The various methods of taming🔽are held in the mind of the teacher.

original: chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba //
analyzed: chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba //
translated: The nature of all phenomena is held

original: zhes pa ston pa'i thugs la'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ston pa'i thugs la'o //
translated: in the mind of the teacher.

original: shes rab chen po'i skad cig la //
analyzed: shes rab chen po'i skad cig la //
translated: In an instant of great wisdom,

original: chos kun khong du chud pa'o //
analyzed: chos kun khong du chud pa'o //
translated: all phenomena are comprehended.

original: zhes pa rdo rje sems dpa' lus kyi mtha' med rtogs kyis sbubs su rdzogs pa'i tshe thos rtogs dus gcig tu 'char ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa rdo rje sems dpa' lus kyi mtha' med rtogs kyis sbubs su rdzogs pa'i tshe thos rtogs dus gcig tu 'char ba'o //
translated: When Vajrasattva is perfected in the womb of the realization of the infinite body, hearing and realization arise simultaneously.

original: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad dus gcig tu mkhyen pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad dus gcig tu mkhyen pa'o //
translated: All phenomena of samsara and nirvana are known simultaneously.

original: chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste //
analyzed: chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste //
translated: The realization of all phenomena.

original: zhes pa 'khor @55b 'das kyi chos thams cad lkog tu ma gyur par mngon par snang zhing rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa 'khor @55b 'das kyi chos thams cad lkog tu ma gyur par mngon par snang zhing rdzogs pa'o //
translated: This is the complete and manifest appearance of all phenomena of samsara and nirvana.

original: thub pa blo mchog 'byung ba'i mtha' //
analyzed: thub pa blo mchog 'byung ba'i mtha' //
translated: The end of the arising of the supreme mind of the Sage.

original: zhes pa ston pa blo'i mchog dang ldan pas 'byung ba'i mtha' chos sku rin po che rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ston pa blo'i mchog dang ldan pas 'byung ba'i mtha' chos sku rin po che rtogs pa'o //
translated: This is the realization of the precious dharmakaya, the end of the arising of the teacher endowed with the supreme mind.

original: de ji ltar rtogs she na //
analyzed: de ji ltar rtogs she na //
translated: How is that realized?🔽The self of unwavering clarity.

original: mi g-yo rab tu dang ba'i bdag / ces pa rin po che'i rdo rje'i gdan la dgongs pa mi g-yo bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: mi g-yo rab tu dang ba'i bdag / ces pa rin po che'i rdo rje'i gdan la dgongs pa mi g-yo bar gnas pa'o //
translated: This is abiding on the vajra seat of the precious gem without wavering from the transcendent state.

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang //
translated: The perfect buddha holds the enlightenment.

original: zhes pa rig pa ye shes kyi sku lnga rin po che'i sbubs na nad gsal mi 'bral ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa rig pa ye shes kyi sku lnga rin po che'i sbubs na nad gsal mi 'bral ba'o //
translated: This is the five kayas of the precious gem of the body of gnosis and vidya inseparable from the light.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa //
translated: The direct perception of all buddhas.

original: zhes pa rig pa shes rab kyi sku la ye shes kyi spyan mngon sum du snang ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa rig pa shes rab kyi sku la ye shes kyi spyan mngon sum du snang ba'o //
translated: This is the eye of gnosis directly appearing in the kaya of the body of wisdom and vidya.

original: dngos gong zhe na /
analyzed: dngos gong zhe na /
translated: What is the substance?

original: ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal //
analyzed: ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal //
translated: The flame of gnosis is the light of clarity.

original: zhes pa rig pa'i ngang nas ye shes kyi bum pa lnga gsal te /
analyzed: zhes pa rig pa'i ngang nas ye shes kyi bum pa lnga gsal te /
translated: The five vases of pristine consciousness are clear from within the state of vidyā.

original: de'i ngang nas rig pa shes rab kyi sku lnga gnas so //
analyzed: de'i ngang nas rig pa shes rab kyi sku lnga gnas so //
translated: From within that state, the five kāyas of the wisdom of vidyā abide.

original: de dag thams cad don so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba'o //
analyzed: de dag thams cad don so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba'o //
translated: All of those are the appearances of the individually discriminating pristine consciousness.

original: des le'u lnga ba so sor rtog pa ye shes kyi don bstan pa'o /🔽// / da ni don grub pa shes bya rgyun gyis mnyam pa /
analyzed: des le'u lnga ba so sor rtog pa ye shes kyi don bstan pa'o / // / da ni don grub pa shes bya rgyun gyis mnyam pa /
translated: That explains the individually discriminating pristine consciousness in chapter 5.

original: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi don bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi don bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the explanation of the meaning of the pristine consciousness of uniformity is the accomplishment of the meaning, the uniformity of the continuum of the object of knowledge.

original: ratna pra sa ra du pa ya ma la ma la /
analyzed: ratna pra sa ra du pa ya ma la ma la /
translated: Ratna prasara dupaya mala mala

original: 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste //
translated: The accomplishment of the meaning of desire is sublime.

original: zhes pa rig pa chos kyi sku las yon tan gyi snang ba sku gnyis dus gcig tu grub ste /
analyzed: zhes pa rig pa chos kyi sku las yon tan gyi snang ba sku gnyis dus gcig tu grub ste /
translated: The appearances of qualities of the two kāyas are simultaneously accomplished from the dharmakāya of vidyā.

original: don sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa skye 'gag med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes su gnas pa'o //
analyzed: don sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa skye 'gag med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes su gnas pa'o //
translated: The meaning is the three kāyas that are inseparable, abiding in the pristine consciousness of uniformity, without arising or ceasing.

original: ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba //
analyzed: ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba //
translated: It purifies all bad migrations.

original: zhes pa thugs rje 'byung ba'i sku gsum mo //
analyzed: zhes pa thugs rje 'byung ba'i sku gsum mo //
translated: The three kāyas that arise from compassion.

original: mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog / ces pa sprul pa'i sku des sems can drug gi mgon dang skyabs kyi mchog tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog / ces pa sprul pa'i sku des sems can drug gi mgon dang skyabs kyi mchog tu gyur pa'o //
translated: The protector is the best of all sentient beings means that the emanation body becomes the best protector and refuge of the six kinds of sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad rab grol byed //
analyzed: sems can thams cad rab grol byed //
translated: It completely liberates all sentient beings.

original: cas pa sprul skus sems can 'khor ba las grol zhes pa'o //
analyzed: cas pa sprul skus sems can 'khor ba las grol zhes pa'o //
translated: The emanation body liberates sentient beings from samsara.

original: nyon mongs g-yul du gcig dpa' ba //
analyzed: nyon mongs g-yul du gcig dpa' ba //
translated: It is the sole hero in the battle against the afflictions.

original: zhes pa rig pa'i ye shes la nyon mongs pa ma grub pas g-yul bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa rig pa'i ye shes la nyon mongs pa ma grub pas g-yul bzlog pa'o //
translated: Since the afflictions are not established in the pristine consciousness of knowledge, the battle is averted.

original: mi shes dgra yi dregs pa 'joms //
analyzed: mi shes dgra yi dregs pa 'joms //
translated: It conquers the arrogance of the enemy, ignorance.

original: zhes pa ma rig pa dang dug lnga dang gzung 'dzin dang snang grags thams cad 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ma rig pa dang dug lnga dang gzung 'dzin dang snang grags thams cad 'joms pa'o //
translated: It conquers ignorance, the five poisons, the apprehender and the apprehended, and all appearances and sounds.

original: dpal ldan blo dang rtogs par ldan //
analyzed: dpal ldan blo dang rtogs par ldan //
translated: It is glorious, endowed with knowledge and realization.

original: zhes pa mgon po rdo rje sems dpa' de blo dang ldan pas gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa mgon po rdo rje sems dpa' de blo dang ldan pas gyur pa'o //
translated: Since the protector Vajrasattva is endowed with knowledge, he is glorious.

original: brtan po mi sdug gzugs 'chad pa //🔽zhes pa gzhi @56a * //
analyzed: brtan po mi sdug gzugs 'chad pa // zhes pa gzhi @56a * //
translated: It is stable, explaining the repulsive form.

original: mi 'gyur ba las yon tan mi 'gag pa 'char nus pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'gyur ba las yon tan mi 'gag pa 'char nus pa'o //
translated: Since the basis is unchanging, it is able to arise as the unceasing qualities.

original: lag pa brgya po kun bskyod pa //
analyzed: lag pa brgya po kun bskyod pa //
translated: It is the shaking of all one hundred hands.

original: zhes pa rig pa'i rtsal lo //
analyzed: zhes pa rig pa'i rtsal lo //
translated: This is the dynamic energy of awareness.

original: gom pa'i stobs kyis gar byed pa //
analyzed: gom pa'i stobs kyis gar byed pa //
translated: Dancing with the strength of his legs,

original: zhes pa thabs 'gag pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snad pa 'od du gsal ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa thabs 'gag pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snad pa 'od du gsal ba'o //
translated: This refers to the unobstructed avenue of the wisdom that is the skillful means, manifesting as light.

original: dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la //
analyzed: dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la //
translated: He is glorious, with a hundred hands,

original: zhes pa rtsal lam stobs ma 'gags pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa rtsal lam stobs ma 'gags pa'o //
translated: This refers to the unobstructed dynamic energy or strength.

original: nam mkha' khyab par gar byed pa //
analyzed: nam mkha' khyab par gar byed pa //
translated: Dancing throughout the reaches of space,

original: zhes pa rig pa 'od kyi khang pa can 'od mtha' med par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa rig pa 'od kyi khang pa can 'od mtha' med par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: This refers to awareness, which is “enveloped in light” and so becomes infinite light.

original: sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi yi khyon //
analyzed: sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi yi khyon //
translated: The extent of the ground, the mandala of earth,

original: rkang pa ya gcig mthil gyis gnon //
analyzed: rkang pa ya gcig mthil gyis gnon //
translated: Is pressed down with the sole of one foot.

original: zhes pa chos nyid sa gzhi dang 'dra ba de rkang pa ya gcig gi mthil nyid kyis gnon pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa chos nyid sa gzhi dang 'dra ba de rkang pa ya gcig gi mthil nyid kyis gnon pa'o //
translated: This refers to the fact that the nature of phenomena, which is like the ground of the earth, is pressed down with the sole of a single foot.

original: dngos rig pa'i ye shes nub pa med pa chen po'o //
analyzed: dngos rig pa'i ye shes nub pa med pa chen po'o //
translated: The meaning is that awareness is the supreme and unobscured wisdom.

original: rkang mtheb sen mo'i khyon gyis kyang //
analyzed: rkang mtheb sen mo'i khyon gyis kyang //
translated: Even with the surface of the toenail of his foot,

original: tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon //
translated: He presses down on the peak of the realm of Brahma.

original: zhes pa rig pa ye shes gyi snang bar ma gyur pa med pa'o //

original: gang du gcig na gnyis med du'o //

original: gang du gcig na chos kyi don //
analyzed: gang du gcig na chos kyi don //

original: zhes pa'o // dam pa'i don te 'jigs pa med //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // dam pa'i don te 'jigs pa med //

original: ces pa mi rtog pa'i ye shes yin pas 'khor ba'i chos la nyam mi dpa'o //
analyzed: ces pa mi rtog pa'i ye shes yin pas 'khor ba'i chos la nyam mi dpa'o //

original: rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can //
analyzed: rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can //

original: zhes pa thams cad rig pa'i ye shes rang shar yin zhes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa thams cad rig pa'i ye shes rang shar yin zhes pa'o //

original: rnam shes sna tshogs rgyud dang ldan //

original: dngos don ma lus rnams la dga' //
analyzed: dngos don ma lus rnams la dga' //

original: zhes pa gnyis su med par rtogs pas so //
analyzed: zhes pa gnyis su med par rtogs pas so //
translated: Since it is realized to be nondual,

original: stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo //

analyzed: zhes pa 'gro ba'i don mdzad kyang 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'o //
