analyzed: sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar //🔽zhes pa thugs rje chags pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The line is the light of the autumn moon means that he is free of the faults of samsara.🔽The line is the light of the autumn moon means that he is free of the faults of samsara

original: yang na bde bar gshegs pa'i mtshan dpe'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: yang na bde bar gshegs pa'i mtshan dpe'i khyad par ro //
translated: Or, it is the special major and minor marks of the Sugata.

original: cod pan bzang po mthon ka'i rtse //
analyzed: cod pan bzang po mthon ka'i rtse //
translated: The excellent crown is the peak of the rainbow.

original: zhes pa ye shes lnga'i cod pan la nub pa med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ye shes lnga'i cod pan la nub pa med pa'o //
translated: The crown of the five pristine consciousnesses never sets.

original: dngos rig pa'i rtse la ye shes gsal ba'o //
analyzed: dngos rig pa'i rtse la ye shes gsal ba'o //
translated: The peak of the entity is the clear pristine consciousness.

original: skra mchog mthon ka chen po can //
analyzed: skra mchog mthon ka chen po can //
translated: The supreme hair is the great rainbow.

original: zhes pa ye shes kyi snang ba ma 'gags par gsal ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ye shes kyi snang ba ma 'gags par gsal ba'o //
translated: The appearance of pristine consciousness is clearly unceasing.

original: nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal //
analyzed: nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal //
translated: The great jewel is the glorious radiance.

original: zhes pa rig pa'i ye shes 'gag pa med pa'i thugs rje dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa rig pa'i ye shes 'gag pa med pa'i thugs rje dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The pristine consciousness of vidyā possesses unceasing compassion.

original: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan //🔽zhes pa chos sku'i sangs rgyas la gzugs skus brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan // zhes pa chos sku'i sangs rgyas la gzugs skus brgyan pa'o //
translated: The nirmāṇakāya is the ornament of the buddha.

original: gzugs sku la sprul skus brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs sku la sprul skus brgyan pa'o //
translated: The nirmāṇakāya is the ornament of the rūpakāya.

original: 'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod pa //
translated: Shaking a hundred world systems.

original: zhes pa thugs rje ma 'gags pa 'khrul pa'i snang ba dag pa ye shes kyi snang bar bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa thugs rje ma 'gags pa 'khrul pa'i snang ba dag pa ye shes kyi snang bar bsgyur ba'o //
translated: The unceasing compassion of the pure appearance of delusion is transformed into the appearance of pristine consciousness.

original: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs chen ldan //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs chen ldan //
translated: The great power of the legs of magical emanation.

original: zhes pa sa lam rim pas bgrod mi dgos par ye shes kyi rlung gis srad cig ma la byon pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa sa lam rim pas bgrod mi dgos par ye shes kyi rlung gis srad cig ma la byon pa'o //
translated: This means that, without having to traverse the stages of the path, one arrives in an instant by the wind of gnosis.

original: de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang //
analyzed: de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang //
translated: That itself is the great retention of mindfulness.

original: zhes pa sdar 'dris pa phyis shes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes pa sdar 'dris pa phyis shes pa lta bu'o //
translated: This means that, like being familiar with something before and then recognizing it later,

original: dran pa bzhi po ting 'dzin rgyal //
analyzed: dran pa bzhi po ting 'dzin rgyal //
translated: The four retentions are the king of samadhis.

original: zhes pa dus der mthod pa'i yul la shes pa'i dran pa sad /
analyzed: zhes pa dus der mthod pa'i yul la shes pa'i dran pa sad /
translated: This means that the mindfulness of the consciousness that has previously seen the object awakens at that time.

original: de yang shes rab kyi shes pa skye lugs dang rab dang 'bring dang tha ma'i bye brag gis dran pa sad pa'o //
analyzed: de yang shes rab kyi shes pa skye lugs dang rab dang 'bring dang tha ma'i bye brag gis dran pa sad pa'o //
translated: Moreover, the mindfulness of the arising of the consciousness of wisdom awakens through the specific distinctions of the best, medium, and average.

original: byang chub yan lag ces pa dus der sku'i snang ba gsal ba'o ;
analyzed: byang chub yan lag ces pa dus der sku'i snang ba gsal ba'o ;
translated: The branches of enlightenment are the appearance of the kayas at that time.

original: / yan la gces pa gtso bo'i rtsal lo //
analyzed: / yan la gces pa gtso bo'i rtsal lo //
translated: The most important of the channels is the one that is cherished.

original: me tog spos zhes pa lha mo me tog ma dang spos me ma la sogs pa'i tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor lnga gsal ba'o //
analyzed: me tog spos zhes pa lha mo me tog ma dang spos me ma la sogs pa'i tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor lnga gsal ba'o //
translated: Flowers and incense are the five maṇḍalas of the clusters, such as the goddesses Puṣpā, Dhūpā, and so on.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtsho //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtsho //
translated: The ocean of the qualities of the tathāgatas

original: zhe sa rigs lnga'i yon tan sku bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su snang la de yang chos nyid mi g-yo ba'i ngang la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhe sa rigs lnga'i yon tan sku bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su snang la de yang chos nyid mi g-yo ba'i ngang la gnas pa'o //
translated: The five types of respect are the qualities of the five buddha families appearing as the thirty-two marks of excellence, which also abide in the state of unmoving dharmata.

original: lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshul rig /'du 'bral med pa'i dgongs pa ste //
analyzed: lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshul rig /'du 'bral med pa'i dgongs pa ste //
translated: The eight branches of the path are the transcendent state of inseparability.

original: de yang yan lag tu bslab thabs bzhi dang dus bzhir sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: de yang yan lag tu bslab thabs bzhi dang dus bzhir sbyar ba'o //
translated: Furthermore, the four methods of training are applied to the four times.

original: yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa //
analyzed: yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa //
translated: The path of perfect buddhahood is known.

original: zhes pa bsgom du med pa'i dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa bsgom du med pa'i dgongs pa'o //
translated: This is the transcendent state of nonmeditation.

original: @57a * // sems cad kun la shas cher chags //
analyzed: @57a * // sems cad kun la shas cher chags //
translated: One has great attachment to all sentient beings.

original: zhes pa rig pa la khyad par med pa'i gnad kyis sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa sems can la yang yod pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa rig pa la khyad par med pa'i gnad kyis sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa sems can la yang yod pa'o //
translated: This is the transcendent state of the buddhas that also exists in sentient beings because of the critical point that there is no difference in vidya.

original: yang na sprul sku'o //🔽nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med //
analyzed: yang na sprul sku'o // nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med //
translated: Alternatively, it is the nirmanakaya.🔽Like space, one is free of attachment.

original: ces pa chags bral chags med gnyis med par nam mkha' lta bur yen sa gnas pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa chags bral chags med gnyis med par nam mkha' lta bur yen sa gnas pa'o //
translated: Free of attachment and nonattachment, one abides in the state of space.

original: sems can kun gyi yid la 'jug / ces pa sems can gyi yid dang buddha'i thugs gnyis su med par yang na sprul skus mthun par snang ba'o //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi yid la 'jug / ces pa sems can gyi yid dang buddha'i thugs gnyis su med par yang na sprul skus mthun par snang ba'o //
translated: It enters the minds of all sentient beings.🔽The minds of sentient beings and the mind of the Buddha are nondual.

original: sems can kun gyi yid ltar ma gyogs //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi yid ltar ma gyogs //
translated: It is swifter than the mind of all sentient beings.

original: zhes pa thugs rje'i rtsal thogs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa thugs rje'i rtsal thogs pa med pa'o //
translated: The power of compassion is unimpeded.

original: sems can kun gyi dbang don shes //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi dbang don shes //
translated: It knows the meaning of the faculties of all sentient beings.

original: zhes pa blo rab 'bring gi bye brag shes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa blo rab 'bring gi bye brag shes pa'o //
translated: It knows the distinctions of the best, middling, and worst.

original: sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog pa //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog pa //
translated: It captivates the minds of all sentient beings.

original: zhes pa sprul pa'i sgus 'dul pa'i don de la mdzes shid 'tsham par bstan nas don byed pa'o //🔽phung po lnga don de nyid shes //
analyzed: zhes pa sprul pa'i sgus 'dul pa'i don de la mdzes shid 'tsham par bstan nas don byed pa'o // phung po lnga don de nyid shes //
translated: The meaning of training through emanations is that after the meaning is explained in a beautiful and suitable way, the meaning is performed.🔽It knows the meaning of the five skandhas.

original: zhes pa phung po lnga'i don nam de bzhin nyid shes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa phung po lnga'i don nam de bzhin nyid shes pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the five skandhas is the knowledge of suchness.

original: rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba //
analyzed: rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba //
translated: It holds the five pure skandhas.

original: zhes pa rig pa de ye shes sgyu ma lnga dang mi 'bral ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa rig pa de ye shes sgyu ma lnga dang mi 'bral ba'o //
translated: The five skandhas of pristine consciousness are never separate from vidyā.

original: des 'byung kun gyi mtha' la gnas //
analyzed: des 'byung kun gyi mtha' la gnas //
translated: It is located at the end of all the elements.

original: zhes pa 'og ma'i nges 'byed cha bzhi las grol te /
analyzed: zhes pa 'og ma'i nges 'byed cha bzhi las grol te /
translated: It is liberated from the four parts of the lower definite release.

original: don mi 'gyur ba sku dang ye shes kyi mtha' la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: don mi 'gyur ba sku dang ye shes kyi mtha' la gnas pa'o //
translated: The unchanging meaning is abiding in the limit of the kāyas and pristine consciousnesses.

original: des par 'byung ba kun la mkhas //
analyzed: des par 'byung ba kun la mkhas //
translated: Skillful in all the means of deliverance

original: zhes pa ni ston pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni ston pa'o //
translated: is the teacher.

original: des 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas //
analyzed: des 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas //
translated: Abiding on the path of all means of deliverance

original: zhes pa mi 'bral ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa mi 'bral ba'o //
translated: is not separating.

original: des par 'byung ba kun ston pa //
analyzed: des par 'byung ba kun ston pa //
translated: The teacher of all the means of deliverance

original: zhes pa des par 'byung ba la gnyis te /
analyzed: zhes pa des par 'byung ba la gnyis te /
translated: means that there are two means of deliverance:

original: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: samsara and nirvana.

original: de yang lkog tu ma gyur par gsal zhing snang ba'o //
analyzed: de yang lkog tu ma gyur par gsal zhing snang ba'o //
translated: Moreover, they are clear and apparent without being hidden.

original: yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton //
analyzed: yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton //
translated: The twelve branches are the eradication of the root of existence.

original: zhes pa / dang po lus kyi mtha' ma rdzogs par shes bya'i rtsal ma rdzogs te /
analyzed: zhes pa / dang po lus kyi mtha' ma rdzogs par shes bya'i rtsal ma rdzogs te /
translated: First, the body is not complete, and the potential of the object of knowledge is not complete.

original: mthod pa'i yul la shes pa'i dran pa sad mnus pas ma rig pa dngos su med pa la nyams pa yod pa'o //
analyzed: mthod pa'i yul la shes pa'i dran pa sad mnus pas ma rig pa dngos su med pa la nyams pa yod pa'o //
translated: Since one is not able to awaken the memory of consciousness to the object of the end, there is a loss in the nonexistence of the actual ignorance.

original: de la ma rig pa la sogs pa rten 'brel bcu gnyis su 'khrul lo //
analyzed: de la ma rig pa la sogs pa rten 'brel bcu gnyis su 'khrul lo //
translated: In that, the twelve links of dependent origination are deluded.

original: 'khrul pa'i yan lag srid gsum rtse mo'o //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i yan lag srid gsum rtse mo'o //
translated: The branch of delusion is the peak of the three existences.

original: dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang //
analyzed: dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang //
translated: Possessing the twelve pure aspects

original: zhes pa ma rig pa la sogs pa dag nas rtogs pa 'chang ba ste ston pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ma rig pa la sogs pa dag nas rtogs pa 'chang ba ste ston pa'o //
translated: The Teacher, who holds the realization of the ignorance and so on, is the Teacher.🔽The one who holds the eight consciousnesses🔽is the one who holds the eight collections of consciousness.

original: bden bzhi'i tshul gyi rnam pa can //
analyzed: bden bzhi'i tshul gyi rnam pa can //
translated: The one who holds the eight aspects of the four truths

original: zhes pa ngo sprod bzhi'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ngo sprod bzhi'o //
translated: is the one who holds the four introductions.

original: shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang //
analyzed: shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang //
translated: The one who holds the eight consciousnesses

original: zhes pa rnam par shes pa'i @57b tshogs brgyad de /
analyzed: zhes pa rnam par shes pa'i @57b tshogs brgyad de /
translated: is the one who holds the eight collections of consciousness.

original: de'i don rig pa'i rtsal shes rab dang / de'i yon tan sku dang de'i yon tan sgo lnga'i yul dang de las rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i don rig pa'i rtsal shes rab dang / de'i yon tan sku dang de'i yon tan sgo lnga'i yul dang de las rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: The potential of the knowledge of the meaning of that is wisdom; the qualities of that are the kāyas; the qualities of that are the objects of the five gates; and the consciousness arises from that.

original: rang shar rang grol shes pa'o //
analyzed: rang shar rang grol shes pa'o //
translated: It is understood that it arises by itself and is liberated by itself.

original: bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan //
analyzed: bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan //
translated: The one who holds the twelve aspects of the meaning of the truth

original: zhes pa bden bzhi'i gong bzhin mthong ba yul gyi gnas dang / bstan pa tshig gi gzer bzhi dang mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu dang bzhi'o //
analyzed: zhes pa bden bzhi'i gong bzhin mthong ba yul gyi gnas dang / bstan pa tshig gi gzer bzhi dang mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu dang bzhi'o //
translated: is the one who sees the four truths as above, the four nails of the words of the teaching, and the ultimate result.

original: de nyid rnam ba bcu drug rig / ces pa mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu'i skabs su re re la yang mu bzhir phye ba ste de'i skabs su thig le nyag gcig gi aa ti dang / thig le nyag gcig gi ma h'a dang / thig le nyag gcig gi aa nu dang ;
analyzed: de nyid rnam ba bcu drug rig / ces pa mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu'i skabs su re re la yang mu bzhir phye ba ste de'i skabs su thig le nyag gcig gi aa ti dang / thig le nyag gcig gi ma h'a dang / thig le nyag gcig gi aa nu dang ;
translated: The passage, “One is aware of the sixteen aspects of thatness,” refers to the ultimate result, which is divided into four parts for each of the sixteen aspects of thatness.

original: / thig le nyag gcig gi dngos po'o //🔽rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa //
analyzed: / thig le nyag gcig gi dngos po'o // rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa //
translated: In this context, there is the ati of the sole unique bindu, the maha of the sole unique bindu, the anuyoga of the sole unique bindu, and the entity of the sole unique bindu.

original: zhes pa dang po rig pa'i rtsal 'byung ba lnga //
analyzed: zhes pa dang po rig pa'i rtsal 'byung ba lnga //
translated: The passage, “Awakening is through twenty aspects,” refers to the first arising of the potential of vidya as the five elements.

original: de las thig le lnga /
analyzed: de las thig le lnga /
translated: From that, there are five bindus.

original: de las rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kur grub pas na'o /
analyzed: de las rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kur grub pas na'o /
translated: From that, the five buddha families are formed.

original: rnam pas sangs rgyas kun rig mchog / ces pa gong ma'i rnam pa nyi shu'o //
analyzed: rnam pas sangs rgyas kun rig mchog / ces pa gong ma'i rnam pa nyi shu'o //
translated: The passage, “One is the supreme knower of all buddhas,” refers to the twenty aspects above.

original: de yang kun rig go zhing rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de yang kun rig go zhing rtogs pa'o //
translated: Also, one knows and realizes all.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa'i sku //🔽bye ba dpag med 'gyed pa po //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa'i sku // bye ba dpag med 'gyed pa po //
translated: The passage, “The nirmanakaya of all buddhas

original: zhes pa longs sku yab yum gyi zhal gyi bar nas yi ge drug pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa longs sku yab yum gyi zhal gyi bar nas yi ge drug pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba'o //
translated: emanates countless millions,” refers to the emanation of the light rays of the six syllables from the mouths of the sambhogakaya fathers and mothers.

original: skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs //
analyzed: skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs //
translated: all things.🔽This means that in every instant, he realizes the meaning of the non-

original: zhes pa skad cig ma la snad pa 'char nub dang skye 'gag med pa'i don rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa skad cig ma la snad pa 'char nub dang skye 'gag med pa'i don rtogs pa'o //
translated: existence of arising and ceasing, of coming and going.🔽He knows the meaning of all things in every instant of mind.🔽This means that the mind arises as the expressive power of awareness,

original: sems kyi skad cig don kun rig / ces pa rig pa'i rtsal du sems 'char lugs dang / sems de rang gi gnas la sogs pa'i chos lngar rtogs shing rig pa'o //
analyzed: sems kyi skad cig don kun rig / ces pa rig pa'i rtsal du sems 'char lugs dang / sems de rang gi gnas la sogs pa'i chos lngar rtogs shing rig pa'o //
translated: and that he knows and is aware of the mind in terms of its five attributes,🔽such as its location.

original: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis //
analyzed: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis //
translated: By means of the various vehicles and methods,

original: 'gro ba'i don la rtogs pa po //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don la rtogs pa po //
translated: he is the one who knows the benefit for beings.🔽This means that the nirmāṇakāya benefits beings by teaching the various vehicles, the methods for taming, in accordance with the objects to be

original: zhes pa sprul pa'i skus 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa ni gdul bya'i yul dang sbyar nas 'dul thabs theg pa sna tshogs gsungs pa'o //🔽theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung la //
analyzed: zhes pa sprul pa'i skus 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa ni gdul bya'i yul dang sbyar nas 'dul thabs theg pa sna tshogs gsungs pa'o // theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung la //
translated: tamed.

original: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //
analyzed: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //
translated: He abides in the result of the single vehicle,🔽the deliverance of the three vehicles.

original: zhes pa gong gi theg pa de dag kyang gsum du 'byung ste /
analyzed: zhes pa gong gi theg pa de dag kyang gsum du 'byung ste /
translated: The above vehicles are also divided into three:

original: nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems dpa'o //
analyzed: nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems dpa'o //
translated: the śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, and bodhisattvas.

original: gcig gi 'bras bur gnas te gsang sngags yang dag pa'i 'bras bu kho na'o //
analyzed: gcig gi 'bras bur gnas te gsang sngags yang dag pa'i 'bras bu kho na'o //
translated: It is the abode of the result of one, the result of the authentic mantra alone.🔽The self of the pure element of afflictions🔽.

original: nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag / ces pa ston pa sprul pa'i sku'i bdag po mdzad kyang nyon mongs pas gos pa med de /🔽don gyi @58a * //
analyzed: nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag / ces pa ston pa sprul pa'i sku'i bdag po mdzad kyang nyon mongs pas gos pa med de / don gyi @58a * //
translated: The teacher is the lord of the nirmāṇakāya, but he is not tainted by afflictions.

original: dgongs pa dag ba'i bdag nyid du gnas pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pa dag ba'i bdag nyid du gnas pa'o //
translated: The intention of the meaning is the abode of purity.

original: las kyi khams ni zad byed pa //
analyzed: las kyi khams ni zad byed pa //
translated: The element of karma is exhausted.

original: zhes pa ston pa sprul pa'i skus 'gro ba'i skur don mdzad pa'i dgongs pa dang ldan pa'o /
analyzed: zhes pa ston pa sprul pa'i skus 'gro ba'i skur don mdzad pa'i dgongs pa dang ldan pa'o /
translated: The teacher is the nirmāṇakāya who has the intention of performing benefits for migrating beings.

original: chu bo rgya mtsho kun las rgal //
analyzed: chu bo rgya mtsho kun las rgal //
translated: All rivers and oceans are crossed.

original: zhes pa 'dod pa dang srid pa dang lta ba dang ma rig pa'i chu bo dang bzhi las 'das pa'i don de ston pa de'o //
analyzed: zhes pa 'dod pa dang srid pa dang lta ba dang ma rig pa'i chu bo dang bzhi las 'das pa'i don de ston pa de'o //
translated: The meaning of passing beyond the four rivers of desire, existence, view, and ignorance is taught by the teacher.

original: sbyor ba'i dgon pa las rgal ba //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i dgon pa las rgal ba //
translated: The forest of union is crossed.

original: zhes pa srid pa la sogs pa bzhi la nges par gnas pa las ston pa nges par 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa srid pa la sogs pa bzhi la nges par gnas pa las ston pa nges par 'byung ba'o //
translated: The teacher definitely arises from the four definite abodes, such as existence.🔽The self of the pure element of afflictions

original: nyon mongs nye ba kun nyon mongs //
analyzed: nyon mongs nye ba kun nyon mongs //
translated: The subsidiary afflictions are the afflictions of the secondary afflictions.🔽

original: bag chags bcas pa gtan spangs pa //
analyzed: bag chags bcas pa gtan spangs pa //
translated: The habitual patterns are completely abandoned.

original: zhes pa ston pas dug lnga khod khro la sogs par bcas pa /
analyzed: zhes pa ston pas dug lnga khod khro la sogs par bcas pa /
translated: The teacher is the one who has completely abandoned the five poisons, such as anger,

original: ye shes chen por grol zhing bag chags dang gis mi gnas te /
analyzed: ye shes chen por grol zhing bag chags dang gis mi gnas te /
translated: and is liberated into great pristine consciousness, without abiding in habitual patterns.

original: rig pa ka nas dag par mkhyen cing gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rig pa ka nas dag par mkhyen cing gnas pa'o //
translated: He knows and abides in vidyā, originally pure.

original: snying rje chen po shes rab thabs //
analyzed: snying rje chen po shes rab thabs //
translated: Great compassion is the method and wisdom.

original: zhes pa rig pa 'gag pa med pa bya brtsal mi mda' ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa rig pa 'gag pa med pa bya brtsal mi mda' ba'o //
translated: Vidyā is unimpeded, without the effort of activity.

original: don yod 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
analyzed: don yod 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
translated: The benefit of migrating beings is accomplished without effort.

original: zhes pa gong ma'i thabs shes rab kyi bdag nyid des so //
analyzed: zhes pa gong ma'i thabs shes rab kyi bdag nyid des so //
translated: The benefit of migrating beings is accomplished by the method and wisdom of the one above.

original: 'du shes kun gyi don spangs shing //
analyzed: 'du shes kun gyi don spangs shing //
translated: The meaning of all perceptions is abandoned.

original: zhes pa don byed pa dang bya ba dang byed pa po'i rtog pa rang rgyud la mi mnga' ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa don byed pa dang bya ba dang byed pa po'i rtog pa rang rgyud la mi mnga' ba'o //
translated: The one who benefits migrating beings does not possess the concepts of activity, action, and an agent.

original: rnam shes don ni 'gag pa med //
analyzed: rnam shes don ni 'gag pa med //
translated: The meaning of consciousness is unceasing.

original: ces pa don byas nas rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad las grol par byed pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa don byas nas rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad las grol par byed pa'o //
translated: Having benefited the meaning, one is liberated from the eight collections of consciousness.

original: sems can kun yid yul dang ldan //
analyzed: sems can kun yid yul dang ldan //
translated: The object of the mind of all sentient beings is possessed.

original: zhes pa mngon par shes pa lnga mda' ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa mngon par shes pa lnga mda' ba'o //
translated: The five supernormal cognitive powers are possessed.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs rig pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs rig pa //
translated: The mind of all the Buddhas is awareness.

original: zhes pa dang // sems can kun gyi yid la gnas //
analyzed: zhes pa dang // sems can kun gyi yid la gnas //
translated: And: It abides in the mind of all sentient beings.

original: zhes pa sangs rgyas kyi thugs ni dngos med kyi ye shes rig pa yin la de 'gro ba'i yid la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa sangs rgyas kyi thugs ni dngos med kyi ye shes rig pa yin la de 'gro ba'i yid la gnas pa'o //
translated: The mind of the Buddhas is the non-substantial gnosis of awareness, and it abides in the mind of beings.🔽It functions in accordance with the mind.

original: de dag sems dang mthun par 'jug / ces pa sprul skus sems can gyi sems shes pas bsam pa ltar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de dag sems dang mthun par 'jug / ces pa sprul skus sems can gyi sems shes pas bsam pa ltar byed pa'o //
translated: The nirmanakaya acts in accordance with the thoughts of sentient beings by knowing their minds.

original: sems can kun yid tshim par byed //
analyzed: sems can kun yid tshim par byed //
translated: It satisfies the mind of all sentient beings.

original: ces pa bsam pa bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa bsam pa bsgrub pa'o //
translated: It fulfills their thoughts.

original: sems can kun gyi yid dga' ba //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi yid dga' ba //
translated: It delights the mind of all sentient beings.🔽What is that thing?

original: zhes pa bsam pa 'grub pas dga' ste dngos gang zhe na /
analyzed: zhes pa bsam pa 'grub pas dga' ste dngos gang zhe na /
translated: It is in the precious sheath.🔽It is free from all error.🔽What is that?🔽It is in the precious sheath.

original: grub pa mthar phyin 'khrul pa med //
analyzed: grub pa mthar phyin 'khrul pa med //
translated: It is free from all error.

original: ces pas so //
analyzed: ces pas so //
translated: What is that?🔽It is in the precious sheath.🔽It is free from all error.🔽What is that?🔽It is in the precious sheath.🔽It is free from all error.🔽What is that?🔽It is in the precious sheath.🔽It is free from all error.🔽What is that?🔽It is in the precious sheath.🔽It is free from all error.🔽What is that?🔽It is in the precious sheath.🔽It is free from all error.🔽What is that?🔽It is in the precious sheath.🔽It is free from all error.🔽What is that?🔽It is in the precious sheath.🔽It is free from all error.

original: de yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de yang gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: rin po che'i sbubs na'o //
analyzed: rin po che'i sbubs na'o //
translated: It is in the precious sheath.🔽It is free from all error.🔽What is that?🔽It is in the precious sheath.

original: nor ba thams cad rnam par spangs //
analyzed: nor ba thams cad rnam par spangs //
translated: It is free from all error.🔽What is that?🔽It is in the precious sheath.🔽It is free from all error.

original: zhes pa gol sa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa gol sa dang bral ba'o //
translated: What is that?🔽It is in the precious sheath.

original: don gsum the tshom med pa'i blo //
analyzed: don gsum the tshom med pa'i blo //
translated: It is free from all error.🔽What is that?

original: zhes pa sgra'i bye brag @58b 'ga' la 'jug ste 'dir ngo sprod gsum la bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa sgra'i bye brag @58b 'ga' la 'jug ste 'dir ngo sprod gsum la bya'o //
translated: The term “nature” is used for some specific words and here it refers to the three introductions.

original: de yang ngo sprad pas the tshom dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: de yang ngo sprad pas the tshom dang bral ba'o //
translated: Moreover, since there is an introduction, one is free from doubt.

original: kun don byed ces pa 'khor 'das kun gyi'o //
analyzed: kun don byed ces pa 'khor 'das kun gyi'o //
translated: “The benefit of all” refers to all samsara and nirvana.

original: yon tan zhes pa thams cad yon tan du shar pa'o //
analyzed: yon tan zhes pa thams cad yon tan du shar pa'o //
translated: “Quality” means that everything arises as a quality.

original: gsum gyi bdag ces pa sku gsum gyi bdag po'o //
analyzed: gsum gyi bdag ces pa sku gsum gyi bdag po'o //
translated: “Master of the three” is the master of the three kāyas.

original: phung po lnga don dus gsum du //
analyzed: phung po lnga don dus gsum du //
translated: The five aggregates are the benefit of the three times.

original: zhes pa phung po lnga'i don dus gsum du mdzad cing gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa phung po lnga'i don dus gsum du mdzad cing gnas pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the five aggregates is performed and abides in the three times.

original: de yang ji ltar gnas na ye shes kyi sku rang gis rnam par dag par gnas so //
analyzed: de yang ji ltar gnas na ye shes kyi sku rang gis rnam par dag par gnas so //
translated: Moreover, if it is asked how does it abide, the kāya of pristine consciousness abides as pure by nature.

original: skad cig thams cad bye brag phyed //
analyzed: skad cig thams cad bye brag phyed //
translated: All moments are distinguished.

original: ces pa da ltar skad cig ma gcig yin te /
analyzed: ces pa da ltar skad cig ma gcig yin te /
translated: The present is a single moment.

original: phyis ye shes skye ba ste /
analyzed: phyis ye shes skye ba ste /
translated: Later, pristine consciousness arises.

original: de ni dbang po rab 'bring gi grol lugs so //
analyzed: de ni dbang po rab 'bring gi grol lugs so //
translated: That is the system of liberation of the highest and middling.

original: de las lhag pa ni skad cig gcig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas te rab bo //
analyzed: de las lhag pa ni skad cig gcig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas te rab bo //
translated: Superior to that, perfect buddhahood in a single moment is the highest.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang //
translated: The nature of all buddhas is held.

original: zhes pa longs sku bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: zhes pa longs sku bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so //
translated: This is the sambhogakaya of forty-two.🔽The bodyless body, the supreme body

original: lus med lus te lus gyi mchog / ces ba bag chags kyi lus mi gnas te /
analyzed: lus med lus te lus gyi mchog / ces ba bag chags kyi lus mi gnas te /
translated: The body of traces does not abide.

original: ye shes gyi sku'i mchog tu gnas pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes gyi sku'i mchog tu gnas pa'o //
translated: It abides as the supreme body of pristine consciousness.

original: lus kyi mtha' ni rtogs pa po //
analyzed: lus kyi mtha' ni rtogs pa po //
translated: The body’s limit is realized.

original: zhes pa rin po che lta bu'i sku rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa rin po che lta bu'i sku rtogs pa'o //
translated: The body of the precious one is realized.

original: gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun du ston //
analyzed: gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun du ston //
translated: It displays all kinds of forms.

original: zhes pa sprul pa'i sku 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa sprul pa'i sku 'byin pa'o //
translated: It emits the nirmanakaya.🔽The great jewel, the crest jewel,

original: nor bu chen po rin chen tog / ces pa de nas slar myang na las 'das te /
analyzed: nor bu chen po rin chen tog / ces pa de nas slar myang na las 'das te /
translated: then, having transcended the throat,

original: chos sku rin po che'i dang la gnas te /
analyzed: chos sku rin po che'i dang la gnas te /
translated: it abides on the precious stage of the dharmakaya.

original: dgongs pa phyis mi 'gyur bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pa phyis mi 'gyur bar gnas pa'o //
translated: The transcendent state abides without later changing.

original: de yan chad du le'u drug pa gzhi skye 'gag med pa mnyam pa nyid du gnas pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi don bstan pa'o /
analyzed: de yan chad du le'u drug pa gzhi skye 'gag med pa mnyam pa nyid du gnas pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi don bstan pa'o /
translated: Up to this point, the meaning of the sixth chapter has been explained in the section on the meaning of the pristine consciousness of uniformity because the basis is said to be uniform and without arising or ceasing.

original: // / da ni don bdun pa shes bya thogs pa med pa bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi don bstan par bya ste //
analyzed: // / da ni don bdun pa shes bya thogs pa med pa bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi don bstan par bya ste //
translated: Now, the meaning of the seventh topic will be explained, the meaning of the pristine consciousness of successful activities, the unobstructed object of knowledge.

original: aa ha dzny'a na sarba karma tsakra'o //
analyzed: aa ha dzny'a na sarba karma tsakra'o //
translated: A-ha-jñana sarva karma chak-ra.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba //
translated: To be realized by all the Buddhas.

original: zhes pa dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyis rtogs par bya ba ni rang rig pa'i ye shes nyid yin te //
analyzed: zhes pa dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyis rtogs par bya ba ni rang rig pa'i ye shes nyid yin te //
translated: The object to be realized by the Buddhas of the three times is the very self-knowing gnosis.

original: de rang la rang chas su gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de rang la rang chas su gnas pa'o //
translated: It abides as an innate attribute of oneself.

original: sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med //
translated: The unsurpassed enlightenment of the Buddhas.

original: ces pa rang bzhin rang chas yin te /
analyzed: ces pa rang bzhin rang chas yin te /
translated: The nature is an innate attribute,

original: de'i gong na gzhan med bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: de'i gong na gzhan med bla na med pa'o //
translated: and there is nothing higher than that, it is unsurpassed.

original: logs na med gung na med pa'o //
analyzed: logs na med gung na med pa'o //
translated: It is not elsewhere, it is not in the middle.

original: gsang sngags las byung yi ge med //
analyzed: gsang sngags las byung yi ge med //
translated: Arisen from the mantra, it is without syllables.

original: ces pa tshig dang yi ge thams cad gsang sngags kyi don ngo bo las byung ba yin la //
analyzed: ces pa tshig dang yi ge thams cad gsang sngags kyi don ngo bo las byung ba yin la //
translated: All words and syllables arise from the essence of the meaning of the mantra.

original: de nyid rang tshig dang yi ge las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid rang tshig dang yi ge las 'das pa'o //
translated: That very [meaning] is beyond one's own words and syllables.

original: gsang sngags chen mo rigs gsum pa //🔽zhes pa @59a * //
analyzed: gsang sngags chen mo rigs gsum pa // zhes pa @59a * //
translated: The great mantra, the three families.

original: mtshon byed tshig gi sgron ma des phyi nang gsum du bstan pa'o //
analyzed: mtshon byed tshig gi sgron ma des phyi nang gsum du bstan pa'o //
translated: That lamp of words that illustrates the meaning teaches the outer, inner, and secret.

original: gsang sngags don kun skyed pa po //
analyzed: gsang sngags don kun skyed pa po //
translated: The producer of all the meanings of the mantra.

original: zhe pa gzhi gsang sngags kyi rtsa ba las //
analyzed: zhe pa gzhi gsang sngags kyi rtsa ba las //
translated: The basis of the mind is the root of secret mantra.

original: gsang sngags spros pa de nyid kyis de nyid mtshon cing rtogs pa bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: gsang sngags spros pa de nyid kyis de nyid mtshon cing rtogs pa bskyed pa'o //
translated: The proliferation of secret mantra is the illustration and the generation of realization of thatness.

original: thig le chen po yig med //
analyzed: thig le chen po yig med //
translated: The great bindu is without syllables.

original: ces pa rig pa rang 'byung gi ye shes 'gag pa med pa la gang gi yang sgra dang tha snyad mi gnas pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa rig pa rang 'byung gi ye shes 'gag pa med pa la gang gi yang sgra dang tha snyad mi gnas pa'o //
translated: Unimpeded awareness—self-originated gnosis—is not a location for any sound or term.

original: stong pa chen po yi ge lnga //
analyzed: stong pa chen po yi ge lnga //
translated: The five syllables of great emptiness.

original: zhes pa chos sku dngos med kyi ngang nas rig pa yi ge rnam pa lnga 'od du gsal ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa chos sku dngos med kyi ngang nas rig pa yi ge rnam pa lnga 'od du gsal ba'o //
translated: Within the state of the nonentity of the dharmakāya, the five syllables of vidyā manifest as light.

original: de mtshon pa aa lta bu'o //
analyzed: de mtshon pa aa lta bu'o //
translated: That is illustrated by the syllable a.

original: thig le stong pa yi ge brgya //
analyzed: thig le stong pa yi ge brgya //
translated: The empty bindu is the one hundred syllables.

original: zhes pa stobs dang thabs ma 'gags pa'i yi ge brgya zhes bya ste /
analyzed: zhes pa stobs dang thabs ma 'gags pa'i yi ge brgya zhes bya ste /
translated: The so-called one hundred syllables of unimpeded strength and method

original: 'khor 'das kyi chos brjod bya rjod byed sna tshogs su shar ba'o //
analyzed: 'khor 'das kyi chos brjod bya rjod byed sna tshogs su shar ba'o //
translated: arise as the various expressions and objects of expression of the phenomena of samsara and nirvana.

original: de yang yi ge brgyar grangs bcad pa ni med kyi mang ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de yang yi ge brgyar grangs bcad pa ni med kyi mang ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Moreover, the enumeration of the one hundred syllables is not a fixed number; it means many.

original: rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med //
analyzed: rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med //
translated: Endowed with all aspects, without aspects.

original: ces pa yon tan sku gsum gyi rnam pa dang ldan zhing mtshan mar mi gnas pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa yon tan sku gsum gyi rnam pa dang ldan zhing mtshan mar mi gnas pa'o //
translated: Thus, the qualities are endowed with the aspect of the three kāyas, but do not abide in a sign.

original: bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can //
analyzed: bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can //
translated: The one with the bindu of the half-half sixteen

original: zhes bya ba de la gnyis te longs sku re re la sems dpa' sems ma bzhi bzhis bskor bas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba de la gnyis te longs sku re re la sems dpa' sems ma bzhi bzhis bskor bas /
translated: There are two topics in that: Since each of the sambhogakāyas is surrounded by four male and female bodhisattvas,

original: phyogs bzhi'i tshom bu ste 'khor ro //
analyzed: phyogs bzhi'i tshom bu ste 'khor ro //
translated: the retinue is the clusters in the four directions.

original: de yang bcu drug ni sems dpa' sems ma bcu drug go //
analyzed: de yang bcu drug ni sems dpa' sems ma bcu drug go //
translated: Further, the sixteen are the sixteen male and female bodhisattvas.

original: phyed ni pho mo brgyad du bcad pa'o //
analyzed: phyed ni pho mo brgyad du bcad pa'o //
translated: The half is divided into eight males and females.

original: phyed phyi ma ni bzhi bzhis bskor ba'o //
analyzed: phyed phyi ma ni bzhi bzhis bskor ba'o //
translated: The latter half is surrounded by four.

original: sprul sku'i skabs su de la yang 'di ltar bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: sprul sku'i skabs su de la yang 'di ltar bstan par bya ste /
translated: Also, at the time of the nirmāṇakāya, it should be explained in the following way:

original: rang 'byung dbyings kyi thig le las rtsal ni phyi dang nang du shar te /
analyzed: rang 'byung dbyings kyi thig le las rtsal ni phyi dang nang du shar te /
translated: The potential of the bindu of the self-originated dhātu arises externally and internally.

original: nang du rig pa'i ye shes dang sems su snang ba'o //
analyzed: nang du rig pa'i ye shes dang sems su snang ba'o //
translated: Internally, it appears as the pristine consciousness of vidyā and mind.

original: phyi bde chen gsang ba'i thig le las bde ba chen po 'od 'bar ba'i thig ler byung //
analyzed: phyi bde chen gsang ba'i thig le las bde ba chen po 'od 'bar ba'i thig ler byung //

analyzed: de las bde ba chen po yongs la khyab pa'i skabs su bcu drug gi phyed brgyad //

analyzed: de'i phyed bzhi ste /

original: gcig padmar shar /
analyzed: gcig padmar shar /

original: gcig mnyam // gcig bde gsal mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: gcig mnyam // gcig bde gsal mi rtog pa'o //

analyzed: gcig g-yo la ma thogs pa'i skabs su chos sku'i bde ba ngos zin cing thugs rje sprul pa'i sku 'byin pa'o //

original: yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das //
analyzed: yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das //

analyzed: zhes pa chos sku spros bral chen po gong ma'i rtsis dang grangs de mi gnas zhes pa'o //

original: bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse mo can //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse mo can //
translated: The peak of the four meditative concentrations,

original: zhes pa 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan las 'das te /
analyzed: zhes pa 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan las 'das te /
translated: having transcended the mundane meditative concentrations,

analyzed: dang dang rang bzhin bdag nyid @59b chen po lhun gyis grub pa'o //

original: de'i don la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de'i don la gnas pa'o //
translated: Abiding in that meaning,

original: bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing //
analyzed: bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing //

original: zhes pa bsgom pa bslang thabs dang bsgom pa'i sa mtshams so //

analyzed: ting 'dzin rig dang rgyud rgyud la gsal zhing rgyud la gsal zhing rtogs pa'o //

original: ting 'dzin lus can lus kyi mchog / ces ba ting nge 'dzin mthar phyin pa'o //
analyzed: ting 'dzin lus can lus kyi mchog / ces ba ting nge 'dzin mthar phyin pa'o //
translated: The body of samadhi is the supreme body is the perfection of samadhi.

original: longs spyod rdzogs sku sku yi rgyal //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs sku sku yi rgyal //
translated: The sambhogakaya is the king of kayas.

original: zhes pa yar zhing dag cing mar 'khor ston pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa yar zhing dag cing mar 'khor ston pa'o //
translated: The sambhogakaya is the teacher of the pure higher realms and the lower🔽cyclic existences.

original: sku bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis tshom bu dang bcas par snang ngo //
analyzed: sku bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis tshom bu dang bcas par snang ngo //
translated: The four kayas appear with the clusters of the thirty-two marks.🔽The nirmanakaya is the supreme body refers to the six sages who

analyzed: sprul ba'i sku ste sku yi mchog / ces pa longs sku'i gsung gi zer la rol pa'i thub pa drug ste /
translated: play in the light of the speech of the sambhogakaya.

original: 'gro drug gi nang nas mchog tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro drug gi nang nas mchog tu gyur pa'o //
translated: They are supreme among the six classes of migrating beings.

original: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba //
translated: The nirmanakaya holds the tantra of the emanations of the buddhas.🔽The previous nirmanakaya is liberated, and the following one

original: zhes pa sprul sku snga ma grol zhid de'i phyi mas 'gro don mdzad de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la sprul ba zam ma chad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa sprul sku snga ma grol zhid de'i phyi mas 'gro don mdzad de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la sprul ba zam ma chad pa'o //
translated: acts for the benefit of beings.

original: phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed //
analyzed: phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed //
translated: Emanations are emitted in the ten directions.

original: ces pa lus par pa na longs sku la chos kyi spyan shar ba'i dus su /
analyzed: ces pa lus par pa na longs sku la chos kyi spyan shar ba'i dus su /
translated: When the dharmakaya arises in the body, the eye of dharma arises in the sambhogakaya.🔽

original: yi ge drug pa'i sgra las 'phro ba'o //
analyzed: yi ge drug pa'i sgra las 'phro ba'o //
translated: When the Dharma eye arises in the sambhogakaya of the body, it radiates from the sound of the six syllables.

original: ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
analyzed: ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
translated: It acts for the benefit of beings just as they are.

original: zhes pa ji bzhin pa la gnyis te /
analyzed: zhes pa ji bzhin pa la gnyis te /
translated: There are two just as they are:

original: snga ma'i sprul pa'i sku ji bzhin du don mdzad pa dang / 'gro ba ji bzhin mthun par snad pas 'dul zhing don mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i sprul pa'i sku ji bzhin du don mdzad pa dang / 'gro ba ji bzhin mthun par snad pas 'dul zhing don mdzad pa'o //
translated: It acts for the benefit of beings just as the nirmanakaya of the past did, and it acts for the benefit of beings by training them in accordance with how beings are.🔽The lord of gods, the god of gods.

original: lha yi dbang po lha yi lha //🔽zhes pa dang // lha yi bdag po lha min bdag / ces pa ni /🔽lhas 'dul ba la lha yi thub pa ltar yang snang /
analyzed: lha yi dbang po lha yi lha // zhes pa dang // lha yi bdag po lha min bdag / ces pa ni / lhas 'dul ba la lha yi thub pa ltar yang snang /
translated: And the lord of gods, the lord of demigods.🔽 For those to be tamed by gods, it appears as the sage of the gods.

original: lha min gyis 'dul ba la lha min ltar snang ste /
analyzed: lha min gyis 'dul ba la lha min ltar snang ste /
translated: For those to be tamed by demigods, it appears as a demigod.

original: 'gro drug gi gnyen por thub pa drug shar ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro drug gi gnyen por thub pa drug shar ba'o //
translated: The six sages arise as the antidote to the six realms.

original: 'chi med dbang po lha yi bla ;
analyzed: 'chi med dbang po lha yi bla ;
translated: The lord of immortality, the guru of the gods.

original: / zhes pa lha'i thub pa de lha thams cad kyi bla mar gyur te /
analyzed: / zhes pa lha'i thub pa de lha thams cad kyi bla mar gyur te /
translated: That sage of the gods becomes the guru of all gods.

original: mchog gam gtso bo'o //
analyzed: mchog gam gtso bo'o //
translated: It is the supreme or principal one.

original: thub pa gzhan go sla'o //
analyzed: thub pa gzhan go sla'o //
translated: The other sages are easy to understand.🔽 The sage of humans, the lord of humans.🔽 The sage of humans appears as the lord of humans.🔽 The sage of animals appears as a great fish.🔽 The sage of pretas appears as a preta.🔽 The sage of hell beings appears as a hell being.🔽 The sage of the demigods appears as a demigod.🔽 The sage of the gods appears as a god.🔽 The sage of the rakshasas appears as a rakshasa.🔽 The sage of the pisacas appears as a pisaca.🔽 The sage of the bhutas appears as a bhūta.🔽 The sage of the kumbhāṇḍas appears as a kumbhāṇḍa.🔽 The sage of the piśācas appears as a piśāca.🔽 The sage of the rākṣasas appears as a rākṣasa.🔽 The sage of the pretas appears as a preta.🔽 The sage of the animals appears as a great fish.🔽 The sage of the humans appears as a human.

original: 'joms byed 'dzoms byed dbang phyug po //
analyzed: 'joms byed 'dzoms byed dbang phyug po //
translated: The conqueror, the gatherer, the lord.

original: zhes pa gzung ba dang 'dzin pa 'dzoms pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa gzung ba dang 'dzin pa 'dzoms pa'o //
translated: This is the gathering of the apprehended and the apprehender.

original: srid pa'i dgon pa las rgal ba //
analyzed: srid pa'i dgon pa las rgal ba //
translated: The one who has crossed the jungle of existence.

original: zhes pa rtogs pa can 'chi ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa rtogs pa can 'chi ba'o //
translated: This is the death of the one who has realization.

original: ston pa gcig pu 'gro ba'i bla //
analyzed: ston pa gcig pu 'gro ba'i bla //
translated: The teacher, the sole leader of the world.

original: zhes pa / ston pa sprul pa'i skur sprul nas 'gro ba drug gi bla ma dang gong mar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa / ston pa sprul pa'i skur sprul nas 'gro ba drug gi bla ma dang gong mar gyur pa'o //
translated: Having emanated as the teacher, the emanation body, he is the guru and superior of the six kinds of migrating beings.

original: 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa //
translated: The one who is renowned in the ten directions of the world.

original: zhes sa gnyis te rig pa'i yon tan de ltar snang ba dang / de'i sprul pa de ltar snang zhing grags pa'o //
analyzed: zhes sa gnyis te rig pa'i yon tan de ltar snang ba dang / de'i sprul pa de ltar snang zhing grags pa'o //
translated: This is the second stage: the qualities of knowledge appear in that way, and the emanations of that appear and are renowned in that way.

original: chos kyi sbyin bdag @60a * //🔽che ba po //
analyzed: chos kyi sbyin bdag @60a * // che ba po //
translated: The great lord of the gift of dharma.🔽This is the quality of the dharmakāya and the expression of that.🔽The one who is clad in the armor of love

original: zhes pa yon tan chos skur 'gyur ba dang / de brjod par 'gyur ba dang // byams pa'i go chas bgos pa ste //
analyzed: zhes pa yon tan chos skur 'gyur ba dang / de brjod par 'gyur ba dang // byams pa'i go chas bgos pa ste //
translated: and

original: zhes pa dang // snying rje yi ni ya lang bgos //
analyzed: zhes pa dang // snying rje yi ni ya lang bgos //
translated: the one who is clad in the armor of compassion

original: zhes pa sprul pa'i sku de dag tshad med pa bzhis 'dul zhing don mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa sprul pa'i sku de dag tshad med pa bzhis 'dul zhing don mdzad pa'o //
translated: are the emanation bodies that tame through the four immeasurables and perform benefits.

original: shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs //
analyzed: shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs //
translated: He holds the sword of wisdom and the bow and arrow.

original: zhes pa dang // nyon mongs mi shes g-yul ngo sel //
analyzed: zhes pa dang // nyon mongs mi shes g-yul ngo sel //
translated: He conquers the battle of the afflictions and ignorance.

original: zhes pa so sor rtog pa'i shes rab kyis nyon mongs pa dang ma rig pa dang bzung 'dzin gyi g-yul sel ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa so sor rtog pa'i shes rab kyis nyon mongs pa dang ma rig pa dang bzung 'dzin gyi g-yul sel ba'o //
translated: He conquers the battle of the afflictions, ignorance, and the subject-object dichotomy with the wisdom of discernment.

original: dpa' po gdul dka' 'dul ba po //
analyzed: dpa' po gdul dka' 'dul ba po //
translated: He is the hero who tames the difficult to tame.

original: zhes pa dang / bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa sel bar byed //
analyzed: zhes pa dang / bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa sel bar byed //
translated: He conquers the four maras.

original: ces pa ston bas bdud bzhi dang gis bcom zhing thugs rjes 'gro ba'i bdud shugs kyis sel ba'o //
analyzed: ces pa ston bas bdud bzhi dang gis bcom zhing thugs rjes 'gro ba'i bdud shugs kyis sel ba'o //
translated: The Teacher conquers the four maras by nature and conquers the maras of beings by compassion.

original: bdud kyi dpung rnams pham byed pa //
analyzed: bdud kyi dpung rnams pham byed pa //
translated: He defeats the armies of the maras.

original: zhes pa ma rig pa'i rtsa ba yan lag dang bcas pa rtsad nas bcad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ma rig pa'i rtsa ba yan lag dang bcas pa rtsad nas bcad pa'o //
translated: He cuts the root of ignorance and its branches.

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dren //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dren //
translated: The perfect Buddha, the guide of the world.

original: zhes pa lus bar pa la chos nyid kyi mkha' la ye shes kyi sku gsal ba'i tshe /
analyzed: zhes pa lus bar pa la chos nyid kyi mkha' la ye shes kyi sku gsal ba'i tshe /
translated: In the middle body, when the wisdom body manifests in the space of dharmata,

original: chos nyid kyi spyan mngon shes dang ldan zhing zhal gyi bar nas yi ge drug pa'i 'khor lo 'byung ste /
analyzed: chos nyid kyi spyan mngon shes dang ldan zhing zhal gyi bar nas yi ge drug pa'i 'khor lo 'byung ste /

original: sprul pa'i skus 'jig rten gyi 'gro ba 'dren no //
analyzed: sprul pa'i skus 'jig rten gyi 'gro ba 'dren no //
translated: The emanation body guides the beings of the world.

original: mchod 'os bsnyod 'os phyag gi gnas //
analyzed: mchod 'os bsnyod 'os phyag gi gnas //
translated: He is worthy of offerings, worthy of worship,

original: rtag tu ri mor bya ba'i 'os //
analyzed: rtag tu ri mor bya ba'i 'os //
translated: worthy of constant veneration,🔽worthy of respect, the best of those who are to be served,

original: bkur 'os rjed par byed pa'i mchog / phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i rab //
analyzed: bkur 'os rjed par byed pa'i mchog / phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i rab //
translated: the most venerable of the venerable.

original: ces pa ston pa sprul pa'i sku de yon tan dang ldan pas ci'i phyir zhe na //
analyzed: ces pa ston pa sprul pa'i sku de yon tan dang ldan pas ci'i phyir zhe na //
translated: Why is the teacher, the emanation body, endowed with good qualities?

original: 'jig rten gsum po gom gcig bgrod //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum po gom gcig bgrod //
translated: He traverses the three worlds in a single step.

original: ces 'byung ste ston pa'i thugs rjes rtogs pa rgyud la bskyed nas sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sa 'di nas sangs rgyas longs sku'i sar skad cig la seng ge'i mchongs stabs lta bu'o //
analyzed: ces 'byung ste ston pa'i thugs rjes rtogs pa rgyud la bskyed nas sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sa 'di nas sangs rgyas longs sku'i sar skad cig la seng ge'i mchongs stabs lta bu'o //
translated: Thus, through the teacher's compassion, having generated realization in the mindstream, from this emanation level of the Buddha, in an instant, like the leap of a lion, he goes to the enjoyment body level of the Buddha.

original: mkha' ltar mtha' med rnam par gnon //
analyzed: mkha' ltar mtha' med rnam par gnon //
translated: He conquers like space, without end.

original: zhes pa rig pa zang thal nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa rig pa zang thal nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'o //
translated: Thus, awareness is unobstructed, equal to the limits of space.

original: gsum rig gtsang ma dag pa ste //
analyzed: gsum rig gtsang ma dag pa ste //
translated: He is pure, with knowledge of the three.

original: zhes pa sgra 'ga' la 'jug gis kyang zhes sbubs gsum rang lugs chen po'o //
analyzed: zhes pa sgra 'ga' la 'jug gis kyang zhes sbubs gsum rang lugs chen po'o //
translated: Thus, although it is applied to some sounds, it is the great self-system of the three enclosures.

original: mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug / ces pa chos kyi spyan rnam pa drug drug go //
analyzed: mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug / ces pa chos kyi spyan rnam pa drug drug go //
translated: The Dharma eye is of six kinds.

original: rjes su dran pa yang de rang nyid do //
analyzed: rjes su dran pa yang de rang nyid do //
translated: Recollection is also of six kinds.

original: rtsol ba'o // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
analyzed: rtsol ba'o // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
translated: The bodhisattva, the great being.

original: zhes pa don bdag la sems dpa' las log @60b ste ;
analyzed: zhes pa don bdag la sems dpa' las log @60b ste ;
translated: The bodhisattva is the opposite of a being who is an object for himself.

original: don gzhan la sems dpa' sems dpa'o //
analyzed: don gzhan la sems dpa' sems dpa'o //
translated: The bodhisattva is a being who is an object for another.

original: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i 'jig rten 'das //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i 'jig rten 'das //
translated: The great miracle, beyond the world.

original: zhes pa de yang rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i sprul sku ste /
analyzed: zhes pa de yang rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i sprul sku ste /
translated: The emanation body is endowed with miracles.

original: 'jig rten las 'das te rang sar grol ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das te rang sar grol ba'o //
translated: Beyond the world, it is liberated in its own place.

original: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha' //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha' //
translated: The end of the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyis ni de nyid thob //
analyzed: shes rab kyis ni de nyid thob //
translated: Wisdom attains reality.

original: ces pa rtsol ba dang bcas pas 'khor ba las pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma yin te /🔽shes rab khyad par can rtogs ba rgyud la shes pa'i stobs kyis pha rol tu phyin te /
analyzed: ces pa rtsol ba dang bcas pas 'khor ba las pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma yin te / shes rab khyad par can rtogs ba rgyud la shes pa'i stobs kyis pha rol tu phyin te /
translated: Since it is endowed with effort, it does not go beyond samsara.🔽The perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the power of understanding the special wisdom that is realized in the mindstream.

original: phyogs lhung med pa'i shes rab rnam par mi rtog pa la gnas so //
analyzed: phyogs lhung med pa'i shes rab rnam par mi rtog pa la gnas so //
translated: It is the perfection of wisdom that is free from extremes.

original: bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa //
analyzed: bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa //
translated: He knows himself and others, and is all-knowing.🔽He is the supreme person, the benefactor of all.

original: kun la phan pa'i gang zag mchog / ces pa ston pa sprul pa'i sku des bdag gi don kyang rig shes grol lo //
analyzed: kun la phan pa'i gang zag mchog / ces pa ston pa sprul pa'i sku des bdag gi don kyang rig shes grol lo //
translated: The Teacher, the Emanation Body, knows his own goal, and is liberated.

original: gzhan gyi don stobs kyang rig shes grol te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don stobs kyang rig shes grol te /
translated: He knows the goal of others, and is liberated.

original: thams cad mkhyen te kun la phan 'dogs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen te kun la phan 'dogs pa'i sku'o //
translated: He is omniscient, and is the body that benefits all.

original: dper bya kun las 'das pa ste //
analyzed: dper bya kun las 'das pa ste //
translated: He is beyond all examples.

original: zhes pa 'gren pa'i zla med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa 'gren pa'i zla med pa'o //
translated: He is without peer.

original: shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog / ces pa shes par bya ba'i dngos po'i gnas lugs dang / shes par byed pa rnams 'byor ba ste /
analyzed: shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog / ces pa shes par bya ba'i dngos po'i gnas lugs dang / shes par byed pa rnams 'byor ba ste /
translated: He is the supreme lord of knowledge and the knowable.

original: blo rnam pa gnyis su med par 'gyur bas bdag po'o //
analyzed: blo rnam pa gnyis su med par 'gyur bas bdag po'o //
translated: He is the lord because he is without the two kinds of ignorance.

original: de'i gong na gzhan med pas mchog go //
analyzed: de'i gong na gzhan med pas mchog go //
translated: He is supreme because there is no one above him.

original: gtso bo chos kyi sbyin bdag ste //
analyzed: gtso bo chos kyi sbyin bdag ste //
translated: He is the chief, the lord of the gift of Dharma.

original: zhes pa rigs drug gi gtso bo thub pa drug gis gang la gang 'dul gyi chos ston pas na'o //
analyzed: zhes pa rigs drug gi gtso bo thub pa drug gis gang la gang 'dul gyi chos ston pas na'o //
translated: He is the chief of the six classes of sages, who teach the Dharma to those to be trained.

original: phyag rgya bzhi po'i don ston pa //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi po'i don ston pa //
translated: He is the teacher of the meaning of the four seals.

original: zhes pa / chos sku dngos med 'gag med phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: zhes pa / chos sku dngos med 'gag med phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: The dharmakaya is the great seal, the non-entity which is without cessation.

original: de'i yon tan gyi snang ba longs sku 'od 'bar ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de'i yon tan gyi snang ba longs sku 'od 'bar ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The sambhogakaya, the blazing light which is the appearance of its qualities, is the pledge seal.

original: rang byung gi ye shes gi sung 'gag pa med pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rang byung gi ye shes gi sung 'gag pa med pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The natural pristine awareness which is without cessation is the doctrine seal.

original: thugs rje sprul ba'i skus gdul bya'i don mdzad pa las kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: thugs rje sprul ba'i skus gdul bya'i don mdzad pa las kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The compassionate emanation body which performs the welfare of those to be trained is the action seal.🔽The supreme object of respect of transmigrators

original: 'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gnas kyi mchog / ces pa don de lta bu ston pas na'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gnas kyi mchog / ces pa don de lta bu ston pas na'o //
translated: is the one who teaches that meaning.

original: des 'byung gsum po bgrod rnams kyi //
analyzed: des 'byung gsum po bgrod rnams kyi //
